loans.name: Sonia Maritza

texts.es: Sonia Maritza de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia, ella posee una venta de artículos de uso personal como cremas, perfumes, cosméticos entre otros; la demanda de su venta a aumentado por parte de los clientes, pues saben que los productos que comercia Sonia son de muy buena calidad y a precios realmente accesibles, además ella le da a la clientela un servicio único, siempre muy amable y atenta a sus necesidades; es una mujer de sueños, con ganas de salir adelante, siempre está dispuesta a trabajar y a esforzarse por lograr un futuro lleno de éxitos y alegrías. Una de sus más grandes metas es hacer crecer su negocio es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar perfumes, tintes, cosméticos, cremas de calidades superiores a las que ya cuenta y que estan pidiendo sus clientes. Sonia espera que atendiendo a este nuevo grupo de clientes sus ganancias incrementen y así pueda darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
41-year-old Sonia Maritza lives in her own home.  She has a store where she sells personal care products such as creams, perfumes, cosmetics, etc.  Her customer demand has increased as her customers know that the products Sonia sells are very good quality and she sells them at really affordable prices.  In addition, she provides her customers with exceptional service.  She is always very kind and attentive to their needs.

Sonia is a woman with dreams and a desire to get ahead in life.  She is always ready to work hard to achieve a future full of success and happiness.  One of her biggest goals is to grow her business.  For this reason, she decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL so that she could buy perfume, hair dyes, cosmetics, and creams which are better quality than the ones she currently sells and which her customers are requesting.  Sonia hopes that, by serving this new group of customers, her profits will increase and she will be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, hair dyes, cosmetics and creams

loans.name: María Magdalena

texts.es: María Magdalena D. cuarenta y cuatro años D. edad vive con su compañero D. vida y sus hijos en casa propia. El posee una venta D. productos D. cemento, como: fuentes, columnas, planchas para inodoro, entre muchas cosas mas, se ha hecho D. mucha clientela  pues su producto es muy creativo y los clientes siempre encuentran lo que necesitan y sino ella lo hace, además todo es D. muy buena calidad y a buenos precios, el servicio es excelente pues María es una mujer muy amable y carismática con las personas, para ella el trabajo es una bendición en su vida y la excelencia en el mismo, no es un acto sino un habito que ejerce día con día, quiere mantener y hacer crecer el negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cemento, hierro, acero y arena. María Magdalena tiene fe que su arduo trabajo le permitirá darle sostenimiento económico a su familia y una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en: María Magdalena is forty four years old. She lives with her life's companion and her children in her own house. She sells cement products such as: fountains, columns, and toilet mounts, among other things. She has gained a lot of customers because her products are very creative and the customers always find what they need, or else she makes it. In addition, everything is good quality and at a good price and the service is good. Maria is a very friendly and charismatic woman with people. For her, work is life's blessing and excellence isn't just one action but something she practices every day. She wants to maintain and grow her business and that is why she has asked INTEGRAL for a loan. This will allow her to buy cement, iron, steel and sand. María Magdalena has faith that her hard work will allow her to support her family financially and give them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron and steel.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita D. 40 años D. edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito D. TambogranD. que pertenece al departamento D. Piura.   Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Margarita desD. hace muchos años se dedica a la crianza y venta D. animales D. corral (aves, ovejas y cerdos), sus corrales se encuentra en la parte posterior D. su casa, los cuales son apropiados, los alimenta con comida balanceada, pastos y granos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un óptimo crecimiento para poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados D. la zona y así obtenga buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos D. su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 2500 nuevos soles para la compra D. más animales y su respectiva comida, con las ganancias que obtenga con la venta D. sus animales podrá cubrir su crédito como tener una mejor calidad D. vida.  Margarita es una persona que con esfuerzo y mucho empeño a sabido sacar adelante a su familia para que logren su objetivo propuesto.
texts.en:
40-year-old Margarita lives with her family in her own home which receives basic services.  It is located in the rural part of TambogranD. district, in Piura department.  The people in this area farm, raise livestock and make handicrafts.

Margarita has been raising and selling farmyard animals (birds, sheep and pigs) for many years.  Her pens are located behind her home and they are suitable for her animals.  She feeds her animals balanced feed, fodder and natural grains so that they reach an optimal level of development and she is able to sell them in the different markets in her area, making good profits with which to cover her household expenses.

Margarita has requested a loan for 2,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more animals and their respective feed.  She will use the profits that she makes from selling her animals to repay her loan and enjoy a better quality of life.  Margarita is a person who, through her own effort and a lot of determination, has known how to get her family ahead in life so that they achieve their goals.

loans.use: to buy animals and their respective feed

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es: María del Carmen de cincuenta años de edad vive con su madre en una localidad muy concurrida de personas, ella posee una sala de belleza y es muy visitada por las personas del lugar, María realiza planchados, pistoleados, tintes, cortes entre otros, su trabajo es de muy buena calidad las personas siempre regresan porque les gusta el servicio que les ofrece también vende productos de belleza en el local y a domicilio ya que tienen varios clientes fijos, claro todo a precios bajos; María del Carmen es una mujer activa siempre dispuesta a trabajar, trabaja sin descansar un sólo día, pues su sostenimiento depende únicamente de esta actividad productiva,  para ella la constancia en el trabajo es el mejor secreto para llegar a los triunfos en la vida, es por eso que quiere permanecer constante y le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tintes, cremas, cosméticos, acondicionadores, shampo etc. María del Carmen tiene la esperanza que así podrá llevar a su hogar la seguridad económica que necesitan.
texts.en: María del Carmen is fifty five years old. She lives with her mother in a very busy area. She owns a beauty salon which is frequented by a lot of people in the area. Maria does hair straightening, blow outs, coloring and hair cuts, among other things. Her work is of a very good quality and people always come back because they like the service that she offers. She also sells beauty products in her locale and delivers them to people, since she has a lot of regular customers. Of course, her prices are low. María del Carmen is an active woman who is always willing without resting a single day. Her productive activity is her only support, and for her consistent work is the best secret for triumphing in life. That is why she wants to be consistent and is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to bye dyes, creams, cosmetics, conditioners, shampoo, etc. María del Carmen hopes that in this way she will be able to give her home the financial security they need.

loans.use: to buy dyes, creams, cosmetics, conditioners, and shampoo.

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es:
Esperanza de 41 años de edad, vive en su casa propia con su esposo e hijos, cuenta con servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en la zona rural que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por ser agrícola y ganadera.

Esperanza tiene como actividad laboral la confección y venta de prendas de vestir, desde hace 6 años, su negocio lo tiene en su casa, cuenta con su propia clientela y también realiza trabajos a pedidos, la competencia en el rubro no es mucha, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir sus necesidades familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa mediante Capital Semilla de 1600 para comprar material y aves de corral para iniciar en un nuevo negocio,  así pueda seguir brindando un buen servicio y cumpliendo con los pedidos que le han hecho, lo que le permitirá tener más ganancias para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Esperanza con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo a sabido sacar su negocio y familia adelante en la vida.
texts.en:
41-year-old Esperanza lives in her own home together with her husband and children.  The only basic service their home receives is electricity.  It is located in a rural area of Piura department.  This area is noted for its farming and livestock raising.

Esperanza's business is making and selling clothes.  She has been in this line of work for six years and her business is located in her home.  She has her own customer base and also does work to order.  There isn't a lot of competition in this field.  With the income that she makes, Esperanza is able to cover her family needs.

Esperanza has requested this loan for 1,600 soles from Edpyme Alternativa's seed capital fund.  She will use the money to buy material and also farmyard birds so that she can start out in a new business.  This will enable her to continue providing a good service and complete the orders that she has.  This will enable her to make more profits so that she can improve her family's quality of life.  With a lot of effort and hard work, Esperanza has known how to make progress in her business and get her family ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy material so that she can continue making clothes, and to buy farmyard birds

loans.name: Edelmira

texts.es:
Edelmira de 53 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.   Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Edelmira desde hace muchos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral (aves, ovejas y cerdos), sus corrales se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados, los alimenta con comida balanceada, pastos y granos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un óptimo crecimiento para poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos de su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para la compra de más animales y su respectiva comida, con las ganancias que obtenga con la venta de sus animales podrá cubrir su crédito como tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Margarita es una persona que con esfuerzo y mucho empeño a sabido sacar adelante a su familia para que logren su objetivo propuesto.
texts.en:
53-year-old Edelmira lives with her family in her own home.  The only service her house receives is electricity.  It is located in the rural part of Tambogrande district, in Piura department.  The people in this area farm, raise livestock and make handicrafts.

Edelmira has been raising and selling farmyard animals (birds, sheep and pigs) for many years.  Her pens are located behind her home and they are appropriate for the animals.  She feeds her animals balanced feed, pasture and natural grains so that they reach an optimal level of development and she is able to sell them in the different markets in her area, making good profits with which to cover her household expenses.

Edelmira has requested a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more animals and their respective feed.  She will use the profits that she makes from selling her animals to repay her loan and enjoy a better quality of life.  Edelmira is a person who, through her hard work and determination, has known how to get her family ahead in life so that they are able to achieve their goals.

loans.use: to buy animals and their respective feed

loans.name: Gloria Del Carmen

texts.es: Gloria del Carmen de treinta y cinco años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una venta de pan en el lugar de su residencia y también lo distribuye por reparto ambulante en oficinas y casas particulares, vende variedad de pan dulce y francés, ya tiene mucha clientela pues el pan que comercia es de muy buena calidad y a precio realmente accesible, además el servicio que ofrece Gloria es excelente, siempre recibe a las personas con una gran sonrisa en su rostro, para ella todos los triunfos nacen cuando te atrévez a comenzar a luchar con firmeza por realizar tus mas grandes sueños; quiere ver crecer su negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita invertir en mayor cantidad y variedad de pan al por mayor, para siempre satisfacer a su clientela y obtener mejores matgenes de ganancias. Gloria del Carmen tiene fe que así logrará darle a su familia sostenimiento y seguridad económica.
texts.en:
35-year-old Gloria del Carmen lives with her life partner and children in her own home.  She sells bread from home and also delivers it to offices and private homes.  She sells a variety of sweet bread and French bread.  She has a lot of customers because the bread that she sells is very good quality and she sells it at really affordable prices.  Gloria also offers excellent service.  She always greets people with a big smile on her face.  Gloria finds that all her successes are born when she dares to start working hard to make her big dreams come true.

Gloria would like to see her business grow and so she has requested a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to invest in buying a larger quantity and variety of bread wholesale so that she can always satisfy her customers and thereby make more profits.  Gloria del Carmen believes that, in this way, she will manage to provide her family with support and financial security.

loans.use: to buy bread wholesale

loans.name: Luis Elías

texts.es: Luis Elías de treinta y cinco años de edad vive con su compañera de vida. El posee un negocio donde vende artículos varios como carteras, gorras, billeteras entre otros; últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela ya que Luis siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan, el tener productos variados le da muchos beneficios, además son productos de muy buena calidad que vende a precios muy accesibles y el servicio que presta es grato al visitante del negocio; Luis Elías es un hombre trabajador él piensa que el camino de la vida no es tan difícil si se trabaja con esfuerzo y dedicación  es por eso que decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar carteras, billetera, gorras, calculadoras,  relojes etc. Luis Elías tiene confianza que su duro trabajo le permitirá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, espera poder contar con el apoyo de este financiamiento.
texts.en:
Luis Elías is 35, and lives with his life companion. He has a business selling various articles, such as purses, caps, wallets and other things. 

Lately he has been getting a lot of customers, as Luis always has what people need. Having a variety of products is very beneficial to the business, and besides, he sells good quality products at very reasonable prices. Visitors to the business are pleased with the service he provides. 

Luis Elías is a hard-working man, and believes that the road of life isn't so hard if you work with effort and determination. That's way he decided to apply to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy purses, wallets, caps, calculators, watches etc. 

Luis Elías is confident that his hard work will allow him to give his family a better quality of life.  He hopes to have the support of this loan.

loans.use: To buy purses, wallets, caps, and calculators.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel D. treinta y ocho años D. edad vive con su compañero D. vida y su hijo en casa propia. Ella posee una venta D. productos lácteos D. muy buena calidad, como quesos en sus varioas presentaciones: duro viejo, capita, con chile, con loroco, crema, requeson, quesillo especial para preparar ricas pupusas, entre otros mas; se ha hecho D. mucha clientela últimamente, es muy conocida en la zona porque las personas siempre encuentran lo que necesitan a buenos precios y con un excelente servicio; Isabel tiene mucho tiempo con este negocio y le ha ayudado a mantener su hogar, ella es muy dedicada a su trabajo para ella lo mas importante es la constancia y el amor con el que se realiza, porque solo así se logran grandes triunfos; quiere ver crecer el negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar crema, queso, requesón, leche entre otros. Isabel tiene fe que así logrará llevar a su hogar la seguridad económica que necesitan y continuar colaborando a su esposo en el sostenimiento del hogar
texts.en: Isabel, thirty eight years old, lives with her life partner and her son in their home.  She sells very high quality dairy products, such as various types of cheeses including: duro viejo (an aged hard cheese), capita, cheese with pepper, cheese with loroco (an edible flower), cream, requesón (like cottage cheese), and special quesillo (soft cheese) used to prepare delicious pupusas (traditional Salvadoran stuffed tortillas).  Recently, she has gained many customers.   She is well-known in the area because people always find what they need at good prices and with excellent service.  Isabel has worked for a long time in this business and it has helped her to maintain her home.  She is very dedicated to her work; for her, what is most important is doing everything with faithfulness and love, because it is only from these that great triumphs are achieved.  She wants to see her business grow and it is for this reason she requested a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy cream, cheese, requesón, milk, etc.  Isabel has faith that in this way, she will succeed in bringing her household to the financial security that they need and continue collaborating with her husband to sustain the home.

loans.use: to buy cream, cheese, and milk

loans.name: José Dolores

texts.es: José Dolores de treinta y ocho años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia y en uno de los municipios mayormente poblados del país. El posee un taxi con el que recorre la ciudad y transporta a pasajeros  a diferentes lugares. Últimamente su taxi ha sido más solicitado por sus clientes pues saben que José es un hombre confiable y responsoble, además con precios accesibles, además hay una creciente demanda de pasajeros a razón de algunas deficiencias con que cuenta actualmente el sector de transporte en el país.  José es un hombre dedicado a su trabajo, para él solo los que luchan logran vencer; su taxi necesita reparaciones para dar un servicio al cien por ciento y no decepcionar a la clientela, es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para la reparación de su vehículo de transporte, el taxi y no perder la clientela que posee. José Dolores tiene la esperanza que de esta forma le dará siempre a su familia lo necesario para su sostenimiento.
texts.en:
José Dolores is 38 and lives with his life partner and children in his own home in one of the most populated municipalities in the country. He owns a taxi with in which he travels the city, transporting passengers to different places. Recently his taxi has been requested more often by  passengers because they know that José is a dependable and responsible person and his prices are reasonable. As well, there is a growing demand from commuters because of some current problems in the country’s transportation sector.

José is a man who is dedicated to his work. For him, only those who fight succeed in winning. His taxi needs repairs in order for him to provide 100% service and not disappoint his clients. That is why he is requesting a loan from Integral to repair his taxi and not lose the customers he has. José Dolores hopes that in this way he will always be able to give his family the support they need.

loans.use: to repair his taxi.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: La señora Lourdes tiene un salón de belleza y necesita el capital para la compra de un casco eléctrico para permanentes, para ondulaciones,  ella vive con su esposo y sus dos pequeños hijos en su propia casa la cual le costo mucho esfuerzo y trabajo, ahora ella quiere mejorar y agrandar su negocio su negocio funciona en su propia casa ya que ella vive muy cerca  de una avenida  concurrida y es el único salón de belleza por la zona, ella es la única peluquera y peinadora el sueño mas grande que tiene es darles lo mejor a sus hijos, ver a sus hijos profesionales y personas de bien, es una persona muy emprendedora, trabajadora y con ganas de superación de mejorar su calidad de vida de ella y de su familia.
texts.en: Mrs. Lourdes has a beauty salon and needs capital to buy an electric permanent wave apparatus (helmet-style).  She lives with her husband and two small children in their own house which they bought through much effort and hard work.  Now she wants to improve and expand her business which is set up at home.  She lives near a busy avenue and hers is the only beauty salon in the area, so she is the only hairdresser around.  Her dream is to provide her children with the best she can and see them become professionals and good citizens.  She is very enterprising and a hard worker and is intent on improving her and her family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy a permanent wave apparatus for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Patricia Rufina

texts.es: La Sra. Patricia se dedica  a la confección de prendas de vestir, ella esta sacando crédito por primera vez en nuestra institución, en el momento de la evaluación del crédito la Sra. Patricia demostró una actitud buena, Cortez y amable, La Sra. Patricia, vive en la zona villa nueva Potosí, de la ciudad de la Paz Bolivia, ella en la actualidad vive con su esposo, ambos trabajan confeccionando chamarras ya hace unos 10 años, la Sra. Patricia, saco este crédito para la compra de una maquina ojaladora y además de telas para surtir colores, él taller esta ubicado en la casa de sus papás, uno de sus metas es comprar  su propia casa  y ahí establecer su taller mas amplio, perseverando siempre en el trabajo piensa lograr sus objetivos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Patricia is a seamstress and is requesting her first loan through our institution.  During the loan evaluation interview Patricia displayed a good attitude and was both courteous and kind.  She lives in the Nueva Potosí residential area in the city of La Paz, Bolivia, with her husband.  Both of them work together and have been making jackets for ten years.

Patricia requested this loan to buy a button-hole sewing machine and different colored fabrics.  The workshop is set up in her parents' house.  One of her goals is to buy her own house and set up a larger sewing shop.  She is committed to meeting her goals through hard work.

loans.use: To buy a button-hole sewing machine and different colored fabrics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cement and sand.

loans.name: Benita De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Benita, se dedica a vender tostadas de plátano y de yuca, vive con su esposo y tiene 4 años de estar dedicada al negocio, trabaja de lunes a viernes de las 8:00am a 3:00pm.
Ella necesita un préstamo para la compra de aceite, yuca y plátano verde, con estos materiales puede tener venta para un periodo, mejorando la calidad de ellos.
Este préstamo le dará la oportunidad de crecer en la producción, aumentar la clientela y de recibir mejores beneficios.
texts.en:
Benita sells banana and yucca fritters.  She lives with her husband and has been in business for four years, working Monday through Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m.

She needs the loan to buy oil, yucca and green bananas.  With these items she will be able to continue with sales for some time and improve her products.

This loan will help her increase production and customers, so she can earn more profits.

loans.use: To buy oil, yucca and green bananas.

loans.name: Petrona Paula

texts.es: Petrona Paula tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar con Fundación. Tiene 1 hijo a cargo. Su actividad económica es un kiosco que está ubicado en el parque.  Pues Hace más de 8 años que se dedica a esta actividad. Petrona ha trabajado con esfuerzo y dedicación durante los años. Sus resultados han sido favorables para que siga con su negocio. El dinero que solicita es para capital de trabajo para la compra de productos como golosinas, refrescos, pan, sopas, galletas, cigarrillos, café y gaseosas. Sueña con ampliar más su actividad y mantenerla activa.
texts.en:
Petrona Paula has been working with the Fundación for a long time.  She has a son in her care.  For over eight years she has been running a kiosk in the park.  For a long time Petrona has worked with much effort and dedication.  The profits from her business have been favorable allowing her to keep her activity running.

She is requesting a loan to buy products such as sweets, softdrinks, bread, soups, cookies, cigarettes, coffee and sodas.  Her dream is to expand her business and keep it active.

loans.use: To buy sweets, softdrinks, bread, soups, cookies, cigarettes, coffee and sodas.

loans.name: Jose Balmore

texts.es:
José, es comerciante de verduras, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, solamente él trabaja, aprendió el comercio por unos amigos, tiene su propio local y no posee horario fijo para vender.
Actualmente necesita invertir en la compra de verduras, como güisquiles, papas, plátanos, tomates, cebolla, esta compra le permitirá crecer con mercadería y atender la demanda de los clientes.
El propósito de José es tener éxito en su negocio, pues su familia depende de él, por lo mismo busca alternativas de inversión.
texts.en:
José sells vegetables. He lives with his wife and two children and he, alone, works. He learned the trade from some friends and has his own stall and does not have a fixed schedule for his sales.

Currently, he needs a loan to purchase vegetables such as güisquiles [also known as chayote squash or vegetable pear], potatoes, bananas, tomatoes and onions. This purchase will permit him to expand his merchandise and meet the demands of his customers.

José’s goal is to have a successful business since his family depends upon him. Consequently, he is looking for this funding opportunity.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as güisquiles [chayote squash], potatoes, bananas, tomatoes and onions.

loans.name: Sulema

texts.es: Sulema tiene 28 años, vive con su hijo y su pareja en una casa alquilada. Toda su vida se ha dedicado a las tareas agrícolas, actividad que le enseñaron sus padres, como el cultivar la tierra y que está produjera los frutos para el sostén familiar. Hoy es su fuente principal de ingreso economico, que con la posesión de algunos terrenos, heredados de sus padres, sigue trabajando y cultivando papa, maíz, habas, oca, arveja. A pesar de las dificultades que tuvo en anteriores siembras, debido a las variaciones climaticas, Sulema no ha dejado de trabajar, es más, tiene la esperanza de que llegaran buenos tiempos y que logrará cosechar gran parte de su producción. Es su segundo crédito con MFP, en su primera oportunidad de crédito fue una experiencia positiva para su negocio. En esta ocasión también invertirá el dinero que solicita, en la compra de sacos de abono y la preparación del terreno para lo cual arrienda  tractor.
texts.en:
Sulema is 28, and lives with her son and her partner in a rented house.  She has worked in agriculture her whole life. This is the livelihood that her parents taught her; cultivating the land, and producing crops to support the family. Today it is her main source of income.  

She owns some land, inherited from her parents, and she keeps working and growing potatoes, corn, fava beans, yams, and peas. In spite of the difficulties she had in previous plantings, due to variable weather conditions, Sulema hasn't stopped working.  She is even hopeful that good weather will arrive, and she will manage to harvest much of her production.

This is her second loan with MFP. Her first loan opportunity was a positive experience for her business. On this occasion, she will also use the money she is applying for to buy bags of fertilizer and to prepare her land for planting, for which she will rent a tractor.

loans.use: To buy bags of fertilizer and rent a tractor.

loans.name: Dolores Marleny

texts.es:
Dolores, vive con sus padres, ella es madre soltera de tres hijos, la casa donde vive es de sus padres, su negocio es la venta de plásticos y flores, su puesto de venta está ubicado en el mercado municipal, los productos que ofrece son platos, tasas plásticas, cosméticos, juguetes y flores artificiales.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de flores, juguetes, cantaros plásticos, platos y vasos, con esta compra aumentara su negocio, ofreciendo a los clientes diversidad de productos, con la esperanza de tener mejores ventas.
Actualmente su objetivo es terminar la construcción de su casa, ver a sus hijos vivir en lo propio y cómodamente.
texts.en:
Dolores lives with her parents. She is a single mother and she has three children. The house where she lives belongs to her parents. She engages in selling plastic and flowers in a stall located in the municipal market. She sells plastic dishes, plastic cups, cosmetics, toys and artificial flowers.
She is requesting a loan to buy flowers, toys, plastic jugs, dishes and glasses. This purchase will stock up her stall and she will be able to offer different products to her customers, and she hopes that her sales will increase.
Her current goal is to finish building her house, in order to see her children live comfortably in a place of their own.

loans.use: To buy plastic flowers, toys, plastic jugs, dishes and glasses.

loans.name: Prayer Mountain B Group

texts.en:
Juliet is the facilitator for the Prayer Mountain group.  She and her group members began planting maize with One Acre Fund in 2011.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important farming inputs to distribute to Juliet and her group during Kenya's next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund's integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

Juliet has three children. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seed on credit at affordable rates.  In the recent 2011 season, Juliet harvested 8 bags of maize on 1/2 acre of land, an excellent harvest by her measure.  Before joining One Acre Fund, Juliet was only able to harvest 5 bags of maize on 1/2 acre.

With the profits from her maize harvest, Juliet plans on sending her children to school and buying a cow. 

On the far left of this photo, Juliet and her group members are joined by their One Acre Fund Field Officer, Patrick.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season

loans.name: Las Flores 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Lourdes is a borrower who lives in Santiago, Dominican Republic. She is the coordinator for her group, Las Flores 1, 2 & 3, (The Flowers). This group is composed of 15 businesswomen, all dedicated to doing business around their community and in other neighborhoods in the city.

Lourdes and her long-term partner have two children and live in a simple home in Santiago, the second largest city in the Dominican Republic. Urban areas of the Dominican Republic are very overcrowded. Lourdes sells Avon products, showing the catalog, and then her clients order them. She also operates a food stall where she sells 'Riky' (a meatball sandwich, very popular on the north coast of the country). She sells this in the morning and at night. With her business profits she will be able to reinvest in her food stall. She wants to expand the menu.

This is Lourdes’ fourth loan with Esperanza International, and she hopes to continue taking out loans to grow her business and improve the home life of her family.

loans.use: to buy meat, bread, juice and cosmetics.

loans.name: Angel Maria

texts.es:
Ángel, se dedica a la venta de ropa y crianza de cerdos, vive con su esposo, su hermano y sus dos hijos, todos en la familia trabajan, inicio con el trabajo hace mucho tiempo con el apoyo de su hermano, su forma de vender es ambulante y ha alcanzado experiencia.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de cerdos, ya que desea ampliar la granja, para tener más oportunidades de ganancia.
Su objetivo es que a través de los préstamos pueda alcanzar el crecimiento con los dos negocios, incrementar la clientela y proveer para su familia la alimentación.
texts.en:
Ángel engages in selling clothes and in breeding pigs. She lives with her husband, their two children and her brother, and every member of the family has a job. She is an experienced street vendor, and she started this activity many years ago thanks to her brother’s support.
She is requesting a loan to buy pigs as she wants to expand her small farm in order to have better earning opportunities.
Her goal is to achieve the growth of both activities through the loans, as well as increase the number of her customers and to provide food for her family.

loans.use: To buy some pigs.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
María, vende papas fritas, Hot Dog y bebidas refrescantes, vive con su esposo y un hijo de 16 años, el negocio es estable y posee muchos clientes ya que está ubicada en un lugar donde mucha gente que viaja llega hasta ahí para tomar el autobús. 
Ella quiere comprar mercadería para aumentar su venta como comprar sacos de papas, salchichas, pan, aceite y aderezos, con este préstamo está en la disposición de producir más y ver la posibilidad de tener mejores ganancias. Ella Quiere alcanzar el sueño de tener casa propia, por este motivo se esfuerza para lograrlo en un futuro.
texts.en:
María sells potato chips, hot dogs and soft drinks. She lives with her husband and son who is 16 years old. Her business is stable and has a lot of customers as it is located in a place where many people who travel go to get the bus.

She wants to buy merchandise to increase her sales, items such as sacks of potatoes, sausages, bread, oil and seasonings. With this loan she is in a better position to produce more and see the possibility of better earnings. She wants to achieve her dream of owning a home and for this reason she works hard to achieve this in the future.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, sausages, bread, oil and seasonings.

loans.name: Candida Rosa

texts.es: La señora Candida Rosa tiene 47 años. Actualmente es madre soltera con 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. La actividad económica a la que se dedica es la venta de productos naturistas. Candida tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar con Fundación León 2000. Hace más de 4 años que se dedica a este negocio por lo que siempre le ha gustado este tipo de trabajo ya que ella siempre está brindando la mejor calidad a sus clientes. Actualmente solicita financiamiento que será invertido en la compra pastillas, pomadas, hierbas, vitaminas, entre otros productos. El deseo de Candida es mejorar cada día y obtener más ingresos para su familia.
texts.en: Señora Candida Rosa is 47 years old. She is a single mother with 3 children, all minors, in her care. She sells natural health products. Candida has worked for a long time with the Fundación León 2000. She has been in this business for more than 4 years as she has always enjoyed this kind of work because she always offers her customers the best quality. She is currently seeking funding to invest in the purchase of pills, ointments, herbs, vitamins and other such products. Candida's desire is to improve every day and earn more for her family.

loans.use: to buy pills, ointments, herbs, vitamins and other such products.

loans.name: Glenda Rosibel

texts.es:
Glenda, vive con su esposo y una hija de 3 años de edad, ella es ama de casa, dedicada a los quehaceres de la cocina, su esposo es agricultor, siembra maíz, trabaja todos los días de la semana.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de abono y semilla, porque su esposo realizara la siembra y ella le apoyara con el préstamo, aunque su pago lo harán de la cosecha que reciban.
Ella tiene el sueño, de algún día trabajando junto a su esposo puedan construirse su propia casa, ya que actualmente viven con la familia de él.
texts.en:
Glenda lives with her husband and 3 year old daughter. She is a housewife, devoted to her kitchen chores. Her husband is a farmer who plants corn and works every day of the week. 

She is asking for a loan to buy manure and seeds becasue her husband takes care of the sowing and she supports him with the loan, although the repayment will be made from the harvest they obtain. She dreams of one day working alongside her husband to build their own house as they currently live with her husband's family.

loans.use: to buy manure and seeds for sowing.

loans.name: Njete Group

texts.en:
Everlyne is the facilitator for the Njete group in Chwele.  She and her co-group members started planting maize with One Acre Fund in 2011.  

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important farming inputs to distribute to Everlyne and her group during Kenya's next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund's integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance. 

Everlyne joined One Acre Fund in order to help the food security of her family, and make profits that will allow her to pay school fees.  In the recent 2011 season, Everlyne harvested 17 bags of maize on 1 acre of land, a very good harvest.  Before joining One Acre Fund, Everlyne had only been able to harvest 7 bags of maize on 1 acre.

On the far left of this photo is Everlyne's Field Officer, Patrick.

With the profits of her harvest, Everylne will send her children to school, invest in livestock, and purchase medications.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season

loans.name: Santiago Antonio

texts.es:
Santiago, se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad, vive con su esposa, sus hijos y un hermano, todos trabajan en la familia, el inicio el negocio con la ayuda de su madre, actualmente su esposa le ayuda a atender a los clientes y su horario es de 6:00am a 6:00pm.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de una refrigeradora, ya que en su negocio vende refrescos, gaseosas y jugos, la inversión le ayudara para tener el equipo necesario para la tienda.
Su propósito es tener el negocio bien establecido, ser un microempresario de éxito y atender a su familia en todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Santiago sells basic supplies. He lives with his wife, children and a brother.  Everyone in the family works. He began the business with the help of his mother. At present, his wife helps wait on customers and their hours are from 6 a.m. to 6 p.m.

He is requesting a loan to buy a refrigerator, since in his business he sells beverages: soft drinks and juices. The investment would help him have the equipment necessary for the store.

His goal is to have a well-established store: to be a successful small businessman and to provide his family with all the necessities.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for his business.

loans.name: Las Semillitas Group

texts.es: El Sr. Raúl   es divorciado, tiene 1 hijo, Raúl tiene 48 años de edad  actualmente es integrante en la alcancía comunal “Las Semillitas” grupo  conformado por  7 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Raúl trabaja desde hace 9 años en un negocio de planchado y pintura para vehiculos junto con un amigo que es su socio, este negocio surge a raiz de que raul se quedo sin trabajo la situacion era preocupante ya quetenia que mantener a su menor hijo es asi que junto a su amigo forman su negocio con mucho entusiasmo Raul nos cuenta que trabajo muy duro para conseguir lo que hoy en dia tiene gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicacion a logrado mejores ingresos economicos, hoy en dia le paga  asu hijo la universidad y cuenta con una mejor calidad de vida,  con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar mercaderia (pintura y todos los instrumentos que se necesitan para planchar un vehiculo) .Sabemos que Raùl  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos deaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Sr. Raúl is divorced and has 1 son. He is 48 years old and is currently a member of “Las Semillitas” communal bank, which is made up of 7 members who are involved in different businesses.

Raúl has been working for 9 years in a business doing bodywork and painting vehicles, together with a friend, who is his business partner. This business began when Raúl was unemployed and worried because he had a young son to support. That is when he got together with his friend and they very enthusiastically started their own business.

Raúl tells us that he has worked very hard to obtain what he has today. Thanks to his effort and dedication, he has succeeded in increasing his income and now he can pay for his son to attend the university and for himself to have a better quality of life. His goal is to continue growing. He has requested a new loan to buy merchandise (paint and all the instruments needed to do vehicle bodywork). We know that Raúl will achieve his goals with a lot of work and effort and that the loan from Edaprospo will help him.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (paint, etc.)

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
A sus 47 años de edad Julio se considera un hombre muy emprendedor quien vio la necesidad de generar ingresos para su familia, y es así como nace su negocio, Julio vende frutas y verduras en las calles de la ciudad de Medellín en el departamento de Antioquia, allí procura prestar un servicio agradable y ofrecer productos con muy buena calidad y buenos precios.

Hoy en día Julio necesita un capital de inversión con el cual comprar una sombrilla que lo proteja del clima y evite que sus frutas se vayan deteriorando ya sea con el sol o la lluvia, igualmente quiere surtir su negocio comprando mas variedad de productos los cuales le generen mas ingresos y así pueda mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su hijo, sin embargo en este momento no cuenta con el dinero para realizar dichas compras. Sueña con llegar a tener un negocio más grande con el cual poder generar empleos y ayudarle a más personas a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
At 47 years old, Julio is considered a very enterprising man who saw the need to generate income for his family, and this is how his business was born. Julio sells fruit and vegetables on the streets of the city of Medellín in Antioquia, where he strives to provide friendly service and offer high quality produce at good prices.

These days, Julio needs investment capital to buy an umbrella to protect him from the weather and prevent his produce from deteriorating in the sun or rain. He also wants to supplement his business by buying a wider variety of products, and thus generate more income to improve the quality of life for himself and his son, but at the moment he does not have the money to make such purchases. Julio has dreams of owning a bigger business with which to he can create jobs and help more people to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase an umbrella, and stock a higher quantity of produce

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y gallinas, vive con su esposo, sus hijas están fuera del hogar ya casadas, el negocio lo inicio por decisión propia, tiene la granja en su vivienda, atiende las labores del hogar al mismo tiempo que las de la granja.
Actualmente necesita comprar cerdos y gallinas para criarlos, esto le permitirá aumentar la granja y tener mayor posibilidad de ganar utilidades.
El propósito de María es que su negocio crezca tanto en mercadería como en clientes, para tener una mejor condición con su familia, de una manera estable.
texts.en:
María raises pigs and chickens.  She lives with her husband.  Her daughters are married and do not live with her.  

The decision to start the business was her own.  She has a farm at her house.  She takes care of the household chores, and at the same time she works on the farm.

She currently needs to buy pigs and chickens to raise.  This will allow her to expand the farm and to have a greater possibility of getting profits.

María's plan is for her business to grow as much in merchandise as with customers.  This is her plan in order for her family to be in better condition, to be stable.

loans.use: to buy pigs and chickens for the farm.

loans.name: Silvia Argentina

texts.es: La señora Silvia, ofrece los productos variados como golosinas, refrescos, enlatados, sopas, detergentes, papel higiénico y productos de primera necesidad en su pulpería, ya que deseaba incrementar las ventas de sus productos y por sobre todas las cosas deseaba diversificar y no vender solamente un producto, con el objetivo de aprovechar la afluencia de los clientes a su negocio. La señora nos cuenta, que necesita este financiamiento para mantener la afluencia de sus clientes. Su sueño siempre es tener una tienda grande ubicada en el mercado.
texts.en:
Silvia sells various products like sweets, soft drinks, canned goods, soup, detergent, toilet paper, and basic needs products in her grocery store.

She wanted to increase the sale of her products.  Above all, she wanted to diversify and not sell only one product.  Her objective for her business is to take advantage of her customers’ prosperity.

Her dream is always to have a large store that is located in the market.

loans.use: to buy sweets, soft drinks, canned goods, soup, detergent, and toilet paper.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.es: Amelia tiene 56 años, vive con su esposo en la casa que ambos adquirieron. Tiene su granja de cuyes desde hace 1 año, anteriormente solo se dedicaba a la agricultura pero por recomendación de sus vecinos empezó a criar cuyes de manera tecnificada, ya que por medio de capacitaciones que recibió ha logrado ejercere esta actividad. Hoy tieen grna nuemero de cuyes, cerca de 200 que son comercializados de manera semanal y quincenal, de acuerdo la cantidad que requiere el cliente. Considera que su  actividad es un éxito, por tantop desea implementarse de más herramientas y amplair la graja de cuyes. Es la primera vez que esta solicitando un crédito con MFP, un día su vecina le extendió la invitación de integrar el grupo solitario de la que hoy es una de sus socias y esta segura de afrontar puntualmente cada cuota de crédito. Con el dinero comprará cebada al por mayor y mejorar la alimentación de sus cuyes.
texts.en:
Amelia, age 56, lives with her husband in the house that they both acquired.  She has had a guinea pig farm for one year.  Previously she only devoted herself to farming.  However, upon the recommendation of her neighbors, she started to raise guinea pigs using modern farming techniques.  Through the training she received she managed to engage in this business activity.

She now has a great number of guinea pigs, close to 200.  They are sold weekly and biweekly according to the quantity that the customer needs.  She considers her business activity to be a success.  Therefore, she wishes to have more tools in place and expand her guinea pig farm.

This is the first time that she has requested a loan with MFP.  One day her neighbor invited her to become part of her communal bank, and she is now a member of that group.

She is sure that she will punctually make each loan payment.  She will use the money to buy barley wholesale and improve her guinea pigs’ feed.

loans.use: to buy barley and fodder for her guinea pigs.

loans.name: Armida Del Carmen

texts.es:
Armida, vive con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta D. comida, bebidas, tiene 21 años en el negocio, surgió por iniciativa propia, y por el momento es la única fuente D. ingreso para ella.
Armida solicita un préstamo para la compra D. productos como aceite, condimentos, azúcar, gaseosas, materiales para refrescos, todo para el negocio, con el propósito D. tener surtido el comedor y estar preparada para atender la demanda.
La aspiración D. Armida es mejorar su negocio, contar con todo lo necesario para preparar los alimentos y satisfacer a los clientes, garantizándose un mejor progreso en su hogar.
texts.en:
Armida lives with her husband and sells food and drinks. She has had her business for 21 years and began it at her own initiative. At the moment it is her only source of income.

Armida is requesting a loan to buy products such as oil, condiments, sugar, soft drinks, ingredients for beverages, all for her business, with the objective of stocking her dining room and being prepared to meet demand.

Armida’s goal is to improve her business by acquiring all she needs to prepare food and satisfy her customers, thereby guaranteeing a better income for her home.

loans.use: to buy oil, condiments, sugar and soft drinks, for her business.

loans.name: Tania Martha

texts.es: La Señora Tania es una persona emprendedora con ganas de salir de adelante, ella es madre soltera con un pequeño hijo de 03 años,  se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite, huevos, leche en otros productos de primera necesidad para el hogar, además del alquiler de equipos musicales, el crédito otorgado es para invertirlo en comprar más variedad de estos productos con el fin del que el cliente tenga mejores opciones a la hora de comprar, y a la vez obtener mayores ingresos. Su gran meta es hacer crecer su negocio  y a la vez sueña con tener una casa propia. Ella está muy agradecida por el crédito otorgado ya que cumplirá con sus objetivos trazados.
texts.en:
Tania is an enterprising person, eager to get ahead in life.  She is a single mother with a small three year-old son. She sells groceries such as rice, sugar, cooking oil, eggs, milk, and other basic household items, and also rents out music equipment.  

She will use the loan to buy a greater variety of these products, so that the customer has better choices at the time they buy, and she gets more income.

Her big goal is to make her business grow, and at the same time she dreams about having her own house. She is very thankful for the loan granted, as it will allow her to fulfill her plans.

loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy hogs.

loans.name: Maria Diodora

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la elaboración de hamacas y bolsos de hilo, vive con un nieto quien depende económicamente de ella, María tiene más de 10 años de dedicarse al negocio, este es una herencia de familia, ofrece sus productos casa por casa.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de hilo de seda, este es el principal material para la elaboración de sus productos, ayudándole a mantener lo suficiente para ejecutar los trabajos cubriendo la demanda.
El sueño de ella es que a través de su trabajo logre sacar adelante a su nieto, por quien se esfuerza diariamente.
texts.en:
Maria makes hammocks and woven bags.  She lives with her grandson, who is financially dependent on her.  Maria has been in this business, which she inherited from her family, for ten years.  She sells her products door-to- door.

She is requesting the loan to buy silk thread, the main material she uses to make her crafts.  This will enable her to keep enough material on hand to complete the jobs and meet demand.  

She endeavors daily for her grandson, and her dream is that her work will enable her to provide an opportunity for him to get ahead in life. 
.

loans.use: to buy silk thread.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
Josefa, se dedica a la venta D. artículos D. primera necesidad, zapatos, plásticos y lozas, vive con su esposo y el negocio lo administra desD. hace 30 años, está ubicado en el mercado municipal, su esposo la apoya mucho.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. arroz, frijoles, aceite, azúcar, sal, estos para la tienda, la inversión le ayudara para mejorar el negocio y atender mejor a los clientes.
El propósito D. ella es mantener el negocio estable, ya que trabaja junto a su esposo y dependen D. estas ganancias.
texts.en:
Josepha sells articles of primary necessity. including shoes,, plastic items and crockery. She lives with her husband and has administered the business for some 30 years. It is located in the municipal market. Her husband helps her a great deal.

At present, Josefa is requesting a loan to buy rice, beans, cooking oil, sugar, salt, and other items for her store. This investment will improve the business and help her better attend to customers needs.

Josefa's proposal is to maintain a stable business. She works in the store with her husband and depends on this source of income.

loans.use: buy rice, beans, cooking oil, sugar, and salt to restock her business.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es:
Ernesto de 53 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijo en su casa propia, cuenta con los servicio agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Los pobladores de éste distrito se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Ernesto labora desde hace unos años realiza servicio de transporte público en una mototaxi alquilada (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo máximo de 3 personas) la cual trabaja diariamente mañana y tarde, con las ganancias que obtenga podrá solventar sus gastos y necesidades familiares.  También cría y comercializa animales de corral.

El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1200 nuevos soles y su destino será para la compra de una mototaxi de segunda mano y de alimento balanceado para sus animales, al contar con su propia unidad móvil podrá tener mayores ingresos para su hogar.  Ernesto es una persona trabajadora y responsable que con empeño ha sabido salir adelante, con el objetivo que en un futuro pueda brindarle a su familia mejores cosas y estudio superior a su hijo.
texts.en:
Ernesto is 53 years old and he lives with his wife and son in his own house, which is supplied with electricity and water. It is located in the urban area of the Mórrope district which belongs to the Department of Lambayeque. The local people make their living from agriculture, cattle and craftwork.

For several years Ernesto has provided public transport services with a rented mototaxi (which is used for short journeys with a maximum capacity of 3 people) which he operates every morning and afternoon. With the profits he earns, he is able to pay the bills and provide for his family. He also breeds and sells farmyard animals.

The loan he has requested from Edpyme Alternativa is for 1200 nuevos soles and it is to be used to buy a second hand mototaxi and feed for his animals. Having his own transport will mean more income for his home. Ernesto is a hard-working and responsible person and through his hard work he has learned to get ahead. His goal for the future is to be able to provide a better life for his family and higher education for his son.

loans.use: To buy a second hand mototaxi and feed for his animals

loans.name: Confianza Y Fe Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Confianza y Fe” está conformado por 19 emprendedores que se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran venta de ropa usada, comercio ambulante, venta de perfumes y venta de abarrotes. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Temuco. 
Alma quien en la foto se encuentra en la segunda fila del grupo, vistiendo una capa color azul y su cabello es corto ondulado. Ella se dedica al rubro del comercio desde hace 10 años. Específicamente se dedica a vender productos de confitería, además cuenta con máquinas de juego. Su negocio está ubicado al interior de su casa, en una habitación que habilitó para instalar su confitería. 
Comenta que le ha ido bien en su negocio y que las ganancias le han servido para costear los estudios de sus hijos e invertir en su confitería, ya que hace un tiempo instaló vitrinas para su confitería.
Su mercadería la compra a proveedores directamente.
Con el crédito comprará mercadería para su confitería, específicamente galletas, chocolates, jugos, leche, entre otros productos. 
Sus metas en su negocio son abastecer aún más su negocio, para captar un mayor número de clientes. Para esto necesita comprar una congeladora en forma de refrigerador para mantener los helados, bebidas y yogurt. 
Alma vive junto a uno de sus hijos quien anhela estudiar una carrera universitaria, para ser un profesional. 
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la ayuda brindada por Fondo esperanza. Se siente muy cómoda con el grupo del banco comunal, ya que realizan actividades juntos y esto ha generado una muy buena relación entre ellos.  Respecto a las capacitaciones estas le han servido para desempeñarse de mejor manera en sus negocios.  
Temuco es la capital de la región de la Araucanía. La ciudad se ubica a 670 kilómetros al sur de Santiago (capital de Chile). En sus alrededores se ubican una serie de balnearios lacustres (Pucón, Villarrica) y una flora y fauna nativa muy llamativas, concentrada en parques naturales cercanos. Cabe destacar que en esta región habita el 50% de los mapuches, pueblo indígena, existente en nuestro país.
texts.en:
This communal bank, called “Confidence and Faith,” is composed of 19 entrepreneurs dedicated to different trades. Among them you will find a used clothing merchant, a street vendor, a perfume seller, and a grocer. They all come from the city of Temuco.

Alma, is in the second row in the photo, wearing a blue cap and has short wavy hair, She has been a merchant for 10 years. Specifically, she has a candy store with some game machines. The store is located in her house, which was modified to include her store.

She comments that the business has been doing well and her earnings have served to pay for her children's studies and invest in the candy store. Some time back, she installed glass cases. She buys her merchandise directly from proveyors.

With this loan she will buy merchandise for the candy store, specifically cookies, chocolates, juices, and milk, among other products. Alma's goal is to increase the store's merchandise in order to capture a larger number of customers. To do this, she needs to buy a refrigerator with a freezer to keep ice cream, drinks, and yogurt.

Alma lives with one of her children who hopes to pursue a university career and become a professional.

She is very content and grateful for the aid offered by the Esperanza Fund. Alma is very comfortable with her communal bank group. They carry out activities together and this generates good relations among them. The training sessions have served to better prepare them to run their businesses.

Temuco is the capital of the Araucanian region. The city is located 670 kilometers south of Santiago, the captail of Chile. In the surrounding area there is a series of hot springs (including Pucon, Villarrica) and a very attractive native flora and fauna, concentrated in nature parks nearby. It's worth mentioning that 50% of the regions' residents are Mapuche, an indigenous people of our country.

loans.use: buy merchandise for her store; especially cookies, chocolates, juices, and milk, among other products.

loans.name: Jesus Es Prosperidad 5 & 6 Group

texts.en:
Yessenia is the coordinator of her group Jesus es prosperidad 5 & 6, (Jesus is prosperity). She lives in a simple structure with her three children and her long-term partner, also her children's father. She said her most difficult challenges are to help her children to go forward with a good education and a safe living, and to have a successful beauty salon and spa.

Yessenia is excited about her fourth loan with Esperanza. She has had her business for approximately five years, starting with her own resources. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing a hair dryer, some other equipment and beauty products. With this loan, she will be able to expand her business. She will use the profits to save, because she wants to make her dream come true: to have a successful beauty salon and spa.

Yessenia's group is located in Santiago, an area known for tobacco and beef production. Santiago is the second biggest city in the Dominican Republic. The group members are dedicated to selling cloth, food, shoes and jewelry. Yessenia thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: to buy a hair dryer and some beauty products

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
Sandra, se dedica a la venta comida y bebidas, ella vive con su esposo y tres hijos, se han dedicado al negocio desD. hace 8 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora, el negocio es rentable, se apoya D. su esposo para  realizar las ventas.
Ella invertirá un préstamo en la compra D. bebidas (gaseosa, jugos, refrescos naturales), también mercadería como aceite, condimentos y carnes, para surtir el negocio D. productos que le permitan atender mejor la demanda.
El objetivo D. Sandra es invertirle al negocio, ampliar la variedad D. platillos, y continuar creciendo como microempresaria D. la mano con préstamos.
texts.en:
Sandra works selling food and drinks.  She lives with her husband and three children, and has worked in the business for the last 8 years.  She is a very hard-working woman, and the business is profitable.  Her husband helps her make the sales.

She will be investing the loan in the purchase of drinks (sodas, juices, natural refreshments), and also ingredients such as oil, spices and meat, to stock up her business with products that will allow her to better meet demand.

Sandra's objective is to invest in her business, expand the variety of dishes, and to continue growing as a micro-enterprise thanks to the loans.

loans.use: to buy drinks (sodas, juices, natural refreshments)

loans.name: Vicente Anastacio

texts.es:
Vicente tiene 49 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con sólo servicio de agua, ubicada en la zona rural del departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona la actividad que desarrollan es la agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

Vicente desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno (vacas), su corral se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que tenga una buena producción de leche, la que ofrece a los mismos pobladores de la zona, cuenta con clientela fija por la buena calidad de leche que tiene, con sus ingresos solventa sus obligaciones familiares.  Recientemente ha adquirido una mototaxi de segunda mano para trabajar en ella en sus ratos libres y así obtener otro ingreso extra para su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar alimento balanceado y para brindar mantenimiento a su mototaxi que ha adquirido, con ambos ingresos podrá pagar su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Vicente es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que sus hijos tengan otras oportunidades de estudio.
texts.en:
Vicente, age 49, lives with his wife and children in his own house.  The only service the house has is water.  It is located in a rural zone in the Lambayeque department.  The business activities in the zone are farming, livestock, and tourism.

Vicente has been raising and selling cattle for several years.  His corral is in the part outside of his house.  He feeds them balanced feed and natural fodder.  He does this in order to have good milk production.  He sells the milk to the people living in the area.  He has fixed customers because of the good quality of the milk he has.  His income covers his family obligations.

He recently acquired a second hand “mototaxi” (three wheeled motorized vehicle).  He did this to work with his mototax during his free time and to get an extra income for his house.

He has requested a loan for 2,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  The loan is to buy balanced feed and to provide maintenance on the mototaxi that he has acquired.  With both incomes he will be able to pay for his loan and improve the quality of life for his family.

Vicente is a hard-working and responsible person.  The only thing he wants is for his children to have educational opportunities.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for his cows and to provide maintenance on his mototaxi.

loans.name: Rosa Marleny

texts.es:
Rosa, se dedica a una pupuseria, vive con su esposo y dos hijos quienes dependen D. sus ingresos, ella inicio como empleada D. pupuseria, cuando aprendió a elaborarlas decidió tener su propio negocio desD. hace 12 años, su horario es D. 6:00am a 2:00pm.
Ella solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en quesillo, chicharrón, aceite, tomates, con la idea D. mantener en el negocio todo lo necesario para la producción D. pupusas, aumentándola para tener mejores ventas.
La intención D. Rosa es trabajar con préstamos para mejorar el negocio, creando un buen historial D. pago que le permita continuar con este servicio, además D. mejorar  la condición D. vida D. su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa works making pupusas (stuffed tortillas).  She lives with her husband and two children, who are dependent on her income.  She started off as an employee at a pupusa business; once she had learned how to prepare them, she decided to start her own business.  This was 12 years ago.  Her schedule is from 6 a.m. to 2 p.m.

She is requesting a loan to invest in cheese, meat, oil, and tomatoes, with the thought of keeping everything stocked in her business for making pupusas, and expanding through increased sales.

Rosa's intention is to work with loans to improve her business.  She believes that her good payment history will allow her to continue with this service, and additionally to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cheese, meat, oil, and tomatoes for her business making pupusas (stuffed tortillas)

loans.name: Martha Azucena

texts.es: Marta Azucena es una muy buena cliente de Fundación León 2000 por lo que no es el primer financiamiento que solicita, pues ella sabe que este el único medio que ella posee para sacar adelante su negocio. Su actividad económica es la venta de mercadería en general, las compras de sus productos las realiza en Managua porque es aquí donde le resulta mucho más favorable al por mayor, su negocio inicio aproximadamente hace unos 11 años con el apoyo de su familia. Actualmente ha incrementado su negocio, pero solicita este financiamiento para capital de trabajo como pantalones, carteras, prendas, calzado, cosméticos entre otros.
texts.en: Martha Azucena is a very good borrower with Fundación León 2000. This is not her first loan, since she knows that this is the only way she has to move her business forward. Her business is selling general merchandise. She purchases her products in Managua, since it is much more favorable to her to buy wholesale there. Her business began approximately 11 years ago with the support of her family. Today, her business has grown, but she is asking for this loan for working capital such as pants, wallets, garments, shoes, and cosmetics, among other items.

loans.use: to purchase pants, wallets, garments, shoes, and cosmetics, among other items

loans.name: Jaime Wilbert

texts.es:
Jaime, es empleado de la alcaldía municipal de su localidad, vive con su esposa y tres hijos, el cubre los gastos del hogar por medio de su salario, por el momento la necesidad de Jaime es solicitar un préstamo para la compra de productos para el hogar y pagar por las reparaciones del vehículo.
Dicho préstamo le ayudara para mantener el carro en buenas condiciones, transportando a su familia con más seguridad, su aspiración es mejorar la condición de vida de su familia, apoyar a sus hijos para que puedan superarse y tener un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Jaime is a municipal government employee in the town where he lives with his wife and three children.  He covers his household expenses through his salary.  

At the present time, Jaime needs to apply for a loan in order to buy products for the home and to pay for vehicle repairs. This loan will help him maintain his car in good condition, and transport his family more safely.  

His goal in life is to improve his family's standard of living, and to support his children so that they can excel and have a better future.

loans.use: To pay for repairs to the family vehicle.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María D. 26 años D. edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito D. TambogranD., la cual pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadería  y artesanía.

Marìaa desD. hace varios años se dedica a la crianza y venta D. ganado ovino (ovejas) y aves D. corral, su corrales se encuentra en la parte posterior D. su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada, granos y pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para qué pueda ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados D. la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios D. su familia.  Tambièn cuenta con tierras D. cultivo donD. siembra limón y una vez que cosecha obtendrà una ganancia adicional para su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1200 nuevos soles para comprar alimentos balanceados y D. fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras y su producto, con los ingresos que obtenga pueD. cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia.  Marìa es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su familia se supere y  tener mejoras económicas.
texts.en:
María is 26, and lives with her husband and children in their own house, which does not have basic services.  It is located in a rural area of TambogranD. district, which is part of Piura department.  The local people make their living from farming, livestock raising and making handicrafts.  

María has been raising and selling sheep and poultry for a number of years.  Her pens are located in the area behind her house, and are large and suitable. She feeds her animals a nutritionally balanced diet of grain and natural grasses, so that they attain their optimal growth and can be sold in the different markets in the area.  In this way she gets very good earnings to cover her family's daily expenses.

She also has some land where she grows lemons, and once she harvests them, she will get  additional earnings for her household. 

She has applied to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1200 nuevos soles in order to buy nutritionally balanced feed, and fertilizers to improve her lands and production. With the income she receives, she can repay her loan, and improve her family's quality of life. 

María is a hard-working and very responsible person.  All she wants is for her family to succeed in life,  and to be better off financially.

loans.use: To buy nutritionally balanced feed and fertilizers in order to improve her land as well as her production.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana, vive con su hija de 18 años de edad, es madre soltera, solamente su hija depende de ella, actualmente administra un comedor en el que ofrece varios menús, este negocio existe desde hace 16 años, para atenderlo cuenta con la ayuda de su hija.
Actualmente necesita comprar hierro, arena y cemento para terminar de construir la vivienda, otra parte quiere comprar productos para el comedor como gaseosas, jugos, carnes, aceite, esta inversión le ayudara para finalizar la construcción de la casa, contar con productos para el comedor que le permitan tener capacidad para atender la demanda.
El mayor sueño de Ana es tener su casa habitable, que por medio de esta ayuda podrá realizar, además de tener en el negocio todo lo necesario para atender a la clientela, y salir adelante con su hija en los estudios.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her 18-year-old daughter.  She is a single mother and only her daughter is dependent on her.  Ana currently runs an eatery where she offers several set menus.  She has had her business for 16 years and her daughter helps her serve in it.

Ana currently needs to buy iron, sand and cement in order to finish building her home.  She would also like to use part of her loan to buy products for her eatery such as soda, juice, meat and oil.  This investment will help her to finish building her home and have available the products she needs for her eatery.  This will allow her to meet the demand she has.

Ana's biggest dream is to have a habitable home which she will be able to achieve with the help of this loan.  She would also like to have everything she needs for her business in order to serve her customers, and to help her daughter make progress in her studies.

loans.use: to buy soda, juice, meat, oil and building supplies

loans.name: Eduardo Wilfredo

texts.es: El Señor Eduardo es casado tiene una hija, es muy trabajador con deseos de superación, además tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante con su trabajo y esfuerzo. El Señor Eduardo se dedica a brindar el servicio de taxi en una moto alquilada, el crédito otorgado es para comprar algunos accesorios para su moto como un juego de llantas,  además una cama para para  el dormitorio de su pequeña hija. Su principal desafío es el trabajo arduo y constante que realiza durante el día desde muy temprano hasta altas horas de la noche, su gran sueño es de terminar de construir su casa  y el de tener una moto propia, a la vez está muy agradecido por el crédito otorgado ya que con él va a cumplir sus metas trazadas y va a poder tener una mejor calidad de vida para su hija.
texts.en:
Eduardo is married, and has a daughter. He is very hard-working, and wants to improve himself.  He also is very eager to get ahead through hard work and effort. Eduardo operates a taxi service using a rented motorcycle taxi.  

The loan is needed to buy a few spare parts for his motorcycle taxi such as a set of tires. He also wants to buy a bed for the bedroom of his small daughter. 

His main challenge is the hard and constant work that he does during the day, from very early in the morning to late at night. His greatest dream is to complete the building of his house and to have his own motorcycle taxi. At the same time he is grateful for the loan being granted, since it will enable him to fulfill his planned goals, and provide a better quality of life for his daughter.

loans.use: To buy a set of tires for his motorcycle taxi, and a bed for his small daughter.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: Elsa tiene 52 años, es casada , vive en compañía D. su esposo y el menor D. sus hijos en su casa propia. Tiene 20 años D. experiencia en la crianza D. cuyes que con el tiempo se ha convertido en un negocio familiar y una fuente muy importante para sus ingresos. Tiene a su disposición gran cantidad D. terrenos en donD. cultiva pasto, cebada, alfalfa y los almacena adecuadamente y darles después el alimento diario, también se dedica a mantener su granja limpia y saludable, D. esta manera evita enfermedades en sus animales. Recientemente se ha estado capacitando en técnicas D. crianza por medio D. instituciones agrícolas que han visitado en su zona. Gracias a ello y a su esfuerzo y dedicación es que ahora posee 300 cuyes en su granja y esta muy animosa D. seguir trabajando para concretar su meta D. industrializar su granja. Es la primera vez que esta solicitando crédito con MFP, porque vio que era lo más conveniente para concretar sus proyectos. El dinero lo invertirá en la compra D. alimento  balanceado para cuyes
texts.en:
Elsa is 52 years old.  She is married and lives in her own home with her husband and her youngest child.  She has twenty years of experience raising guinea pigs.  Over time, this has become a family business and a very important source of income.  She has a large quantity of land at her disposal where she cultivates grass, barley, and alfalfa. She stores an adequate amount of her harvest so that her family will have a daily supply of food in the future.  In addition, she keeps her farm clean and healthy to avoid the contraction of disease in her animals.  

Recently, she was trained in breeding techniques by agricultural institutions that visited her area.  Thanks to them, and to her hard work and dedication, she now has 300 guinea pigs at her farm.  She plans to industrialize her farm and she is very excited to be able to continue working toward the realization of her goal.  She saw that MFP financing was the most convenient way to complete her projects.  This is her first loan request.  The money will be invested in the purchase of nutritionally balanced feed for the guinea pigs.

loans.use: to buy feed for her guinnea pigs.

loans.name: Santos Del Carmen

texts.es:
Santos, vive con su familia, su esposo y 4 hijos, ella se dedica al comercio D. calzado, su esposo es comerciante D. medicinas, sus hijos tienen las edades D. 35, 31, 28 y 22 años, solamente D. dos son dependientes económicamente; Santos trabaja D. 6:00am a 6:00pm desD. hace 20 años.
Ella invertirá un préstamo en la adquisición D. calzado como chancletas, zapatos cómodos, sandalias, con la compra fortalecerá el negocio, surtiéndolo D. mercadería nueva para ofrecer a los clientes.
Su aspiración es desarrollarse en el comercio, con la ayuda D. préstamos, atrayendo a nuevos clientes para obtener mejores ventas.
texts.en: Santos lives with her husband and 4 children and sells footwear for a living.  Her husband sells medicines.  Her children are 35, 31, 28 and 22 years old.  Only two are still financially dependent.  Santos has been working from 6:00 am until 6:00 pm for the past 20 years.  She will use the loan to buy footwear such as flip flops, comfortable shoes, and sandals to strengthen her business.  She will stock her business with new merchandise to offer her customers.  With the help of the loan her goal is to grow as a business woman and bring in new customers to increase her sales.

loans.use: purchase flip flops, comfortable shoes and sandals.

loans.name: Fernanda Rosibel

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal El Paraíso se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.
