Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has become more focused on her business. She has also gained a lot of knowledge on business management through the trainings conducted by Faulu Kenya. In the next 5 years, she wants to expand her business. She has requested 20,000 Kes to buy onions and oranges to sell.

loans.use: To buy onions and oranges to sell

loans.name: Kundumurimo Group

texts.fr:
Eduard est né au Rwanda et a 44 ans, il est le membre du groupe Kundumurimo. Il est marié et il a 6 enfants de 3 à 14 ans, dont 4 scolarisés et il a d’autres 2 personnes en charge plus que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est 8 ans de primaire. 

C’est son troisième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit pour acheter des planches, des clous, les mastiques utilisés pour fabriquer les sofas. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est bien gérer les matériels et avoir du courage au travail. Dans les prochaines années, Eduard voudrait augmenter ses activités beaucoup plus pour satisfaire les clients en faisant les sofas de qualité. Avec les profits, Il prévoit de payer les frais scolaires de ses enfants et améliorer le bien être de sa famille.
texts.en:
Eduard, age 44, was born in Rwanda. He's a member of Group Kundumurimo. He's married and has six children, age 3 to 14, out of whom four attend school. He has two additional persons to support. He attended elementary school for eight years.

He's seeking his third loan from Kiva's partner, ACB. He will use it to buy planks, nails, and mastics used to make sofas. His strategy for growing his business consists in being courageous at work and good at handling materials.

In the forthcoming years, Eduard would like to substantially grow his business in order to better meet customer demand for quality sofas. With his profits, he intends to pay his children's school expenses and improve the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to buy planks, nails and mastics used to make sofas

loans.name: Josphine

texts.en: Josphine is a business woman aged 38. She is married and blessed with four children. For the last 3 years, she has been managing a general shop to earn a living. She has another source of income in horticulture farming. In the next 5 years, she wants to manage a wholesale business. She is requesting for a loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings to buy rice, sugar and salt for her store. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save part of her income.

loans.use: To buy  rice, sugar and salt

loans.name: Wuilson Antonio

texts.es:
el joven Wuilson tiene 22 años de edad y se dedica al cultivo de café y agricultura, cuenta  con una experiencia de 3 años en el cultivo de la tierra.- Vive con su compañera de hogar y sus (2) hijos.  
Wuilson esta solicitando el prestamo para la compra de una planta de energia solar, en esta zona no hay energia electrica en ninguna casa y Wuilson desea tener una planta que le genere energia para ilumiinar su hogar por las noches, ademas desea poner un televisor pequeño para que sus hijos gocen de este tipo de entretenimiento.
texts.en:
Wuilson is 22 years old and works as a farmer cultivating coffee and other products.  He has been farming for 3 years.  He lives with his partner and their 2 children.

Wuilson is requesting a loan to buy solar energy equipment.  In his area electricity is not available, and Wuilson wants to have his own solar energy plant to generate electricity to illuminate his home at night.  In addition, he wants to get a small television set so that his children can enjoy this type of entertainment.

loans.use: to buy solar energy equipment

loans.name: Rudy Antonio

texts.es:
Rudy, se dedica a vende productos domesticos, él vive con su esposa  y sus dos hijos, este negocio lo tiene en su casa de habitación lo atiende junto a su esposa trabajando desde hace 5 años.
Actualmente necesita un nuevo préstamo para la compra de productos: boquitas, galletas, dulces y gaseosas, su intensión es mejorar el negocio y el servicio a los clientes.
Su aspiración en cuanto al negocio es mejorar las ventas, atender a muchos clientes y por consiguiente mejorar también la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Rudy's business is selling products for the home.  He lives with his wife and two children.  His business is located in his home and he has been working in it together with his wife for five years.

Rudy currently needs a new loan to buy products such as snacks, cookies, sweets, and soda.  His goal is to improve his business and his customer service.

Rudy's aspiration for his business is to improve his sales, serve more customers, and thereby improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pork rinds, soft cheese and soda.

loans.name: Emprendedoras 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Martha is the coordinator of her group 'Emprendedoras' (entrepreneurs) 1, 2 & 3. The group is located in the city of El Seybo, in a rural community outsiD. of the main city. The group numbers 15 small businesspeople, dedicated to many different business activities in their community and the surrounding area.

Martha makes her home in a simple house with her husband and their two children. She plans to continue working most of the time. She became an Esperanza associate because she needed to start a business. She organized with some neighbors to form a group in her community to obtain loans to do business and make changes in their lives. She has had her business for more than five years, starting after her first Esperanza loan.

Martha is excited to be taking out her 8th loan with Esperanza, having successfully repaid her previous loans and expanded her business. She runs a small grocery store and plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying goods including rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, and canned food. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business and to save money.

The group pictures are separated to show as many faces as possible.

loans.use: to buy goods including rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, and canned food.

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en: Thomas is a hardworking businessman aged 40. He is married and blessed with one child. For the last four years, he has been operating a retail shop to earn a living. He has managed to boost his business with his previous loan from Faulu Kenya. He also earns extra income from dairy farming. In the next five years, he wants to buy a piece of land. He is requesting a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to buy sugar, soap, rice, maize flour and sodas.

loans.use: To buy sugar, soap, rice, maize flour and sodas.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: Juan José se dedica a un taller electrónico auto motriz. Desde hace más de 2 años que tiene este negocio, con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado obtener este medio de vida. No es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos. Juan es un hombre trabajador luchador y que disfruta todos los días de realiza los diferentes productos que a diario elabora.  Sus clientes siempre le solicitan diferentes productos y el siempre se preocupa por brindar un buen servicio y calidad. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra sierra de mano, broca, corta frio, remachadora entre otros.
texts.en: Juan José makes his living running an electronic automotive workshop.  He has run this business for more than 2 years, and it's taken him a lot of effort  to achieve this means of making a living.  This is not the first time Juan José has taken out a loan.  He is a hard-working, tenacious man who finds joy each day in making his products.  His customers are always asking for different products, and Juan José is always sure to offer good, quality service.  The loan that he is requesting is for the purchase of a hand saw, drill bits, a chisel and a riveter, among other items.

loans.use: to purchase a hand saw, drill bits, a chisel and a riveter, among other items.

loans.name: Tomas Regalado

texts.es:
Tomas, se dedica al comercio de ganado y cultivo agrícola, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 3 y5 años de edad, él trabaja la agropecuaria desde hace 8 años, aprendió de su padre, trabaja todos los días de 7:00am a 4:00pm.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de ladrillo, Duralita, cemento y hierro, para terminar la construcción de su vivienda, esta compra le ayudara para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, ofreciéndole una mejor comodidad para garantizarles un lugar más seguro.
El sueño de Tomas ha sido la culminación de la construcción de su casa, el cree que gracias a Dios se está logrando este sueño.
texts.en:
Tomas raises cattle and farms.  He lives with his wife and their two children, 3 and 5. For the last 8 years every day from 7 am to 4 pm, he has worked on a fish farm -a skill that he learned from his father.

He is currently requesting a loan to buy brick, Duralite roofing material, cement and iron to finish building his house.  With this purchase he will be able to improve his family’s standard of living, offering them more comfort and guaranteeing them a safer home.

Tomas’ dream has been to finish constructing his house.  He believes that, thanks to God, he is succeeding with this dream

loans.use: to buy brick, Duralite roofing material, cement and iron to finish the construction.

loans.name: Rene Alexis

texts.es:
el sr. Rene tiene 30 años de edad y se dedica al trabajo de la tierra desde hace más de 14 años con una amplia experiencia en el cultivo del cafe, esta actividad es la fuente de ingresos y con esto cubre los gastos familiares, Rene vive en unión libre y han procreado un hijo. 
El Sr. Rene utilzara el credito para adquirir una planta de energia solar, el piensa en lo util que le seria en su vivienda, brindandole muchos beneficios como es la iluminacion por las noches, con esto dejara de usar candiles que no son buenos para la salud y al igual poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Rene is 30 years old and has been working the land for more than 14 years.  He has a lot of experience growing coffee and this business is the source of income with which he covers his family expenses.  Rene lives with his partner and they have one child.  

Rene will use this loan to buy solar energy equipment.  He believes this will be very useful for his home, providing him with a lot of benefits such as being able to light up his home up at night.  He will be able to stop using oil lamps, which are not good for his health, and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy solar energy equipment

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cow hides for resale, to be used for manufacturing various items

loans.name: Magda  Araceli

texts.es: La Sra. Magda es una persona muy trabajadora y tiene un gran amor por los niños por lo cual decidió  instalar  una guardería para madres y padres trabajadores que aun sin tener un empleo fijo pudieran dejar a sus hijos al cuidado de personal capacitado,  es  por ello  que   acudio con nosotros  para   realizar  su proyecto  , el cual  consiste   en  realizar  la compra  de  mobiliario ya  que  comenta que el  numero  de  niños  que  atiende  en la  guardería  a  ido  aumentando  considerablemente, agradece   el  apoyo  brindado para  la realización de su  proyecto  ya  que   ve  en el crédito la  posibilidad  de  hacer  crecer  su   negocio  y  poder   seguir ayudando  a  la  gente.
texts.en:
Magda is a very hard-working person, and has a great love of children. This why she decided to set up a day care for working mothers and fathers, who even without having permanent employment, could leave their children in the care of a trained person. 

This is why she approached us for help in carrying out her project, which consists of purchasing furniture. She says that the number of children that she looks after in the day care has been increasing considerably. 

She appreciates the support offered to her for carrying out her project. She sees in the loan, the chance to grow her business, and to be able to continue helping people.

loans.use: To buy furniture for her day care.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy sugar and bread for resale.

loans.name: Tomas Regalado

texts.es:
Tomas, es agricultor y ganadero, vive con su esposa y 4 hijos de 8, 12, 13 y 17 años de edad, el lleva un buen tiempo dedicándose a la agricultura, pues inicio desde joven, inicia sus labores todos los días a las 7:00am hasta las 3:00pm.
Actualmente solicita el préstamo para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz, con este dinero podrá tener acceso a los insumos necesarios y dar los cuidos al cultivo para que este se desarrolle y produzca buenos frutos.
El objetivo de él es como todo padre, preocupado por la educación de sus hijos para que tengan mejores oportunidades en un futuro.
texts.en:
Tomas is a farmer who also raises livestock.  He lives with his wife and four children aged 8, 12, 13 and 17.  He has been farming for a long time as he started out in this business when he was a young man.  He starts his tasks every day at 7.00am and works until 3.00pm.

Tomas is currently requesting a loan to buy manure and fertilizers for his corn crop.  He will use this money to buy the supplies he needs and to care for his crops so that they develop well and produce good fruit.  His goal, like that of every father, is to provide for his children's education so that they have better opportunities in the future.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers for his corn crop

loans.name: Maria  De La  Luz

texts.es: La Sra. María es una persona que trabaja  todo el día para salir adelante,  ya que es sola con su hijo, y  esta muy contenta de habernos encontrado ya que le vamos a apoyar con el proyecto que tiene el  cual  consiste  en construir las bardas traseras de su casa  la cual adquirió con esfuerzo, agradece  el apoyo brindado  para  la realización de  su proyecto  ya  que   ve  en  el  crédito la posibilidad   de    brindarles  un mejor   patrimonio  a  su  familia  ofreciéndoles  mayor  seguridad.
texts.en: María is a person who works all day to get ahead, since she is alone with her son. She is very happy to have found us [the Field Partner], since we are going to support her with the project she has. This consists of constructing the protective walls behind her house, which she acquired through great effort. She is grateful for the support provided to her to carry out her project, since she sees in the loan the opportunity to provide a better legacy to her family, offering them greater security.

loans.use: to build a protective wall.

loans.name: Edwin Adalid

texts.es:
el sr. Edwin tiene 27 años de edad se dedica a la caficultura, tiene mas de (3) años realizando dicha actividad productiva, tambien se dedica a la agricultura, siembra de maíz y frijoles, y con estas actividades a logrado salir adelante junto con su familia, ya que generan los ingresos suficientes para cubrir los gastos de su hogar, en el que vive con sus 2 hijos y su pareja.
 Edwin solicita un credito, el cual será destinado para la compra de una planta de energía solar, debido a que en el lugar donde vive no cuentan con este servicio básico y le seria de mucha utilidad en su hogar ya que no tendrá que seguir alumbrándose con velas, candiles y rajas de ocotote que es lo que han utilizado durante todo este tiempo, nos comento que sus hijos se han visto afectados por el humo que este tipo de productos producen. dicha planta de energia solar vendra a darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Edwin is 27 years old and has spent more than 3 years as a coffee grower. He also cultivates corn and beans. He has been able to get ahead, together with his family, through engaging in these activities, since they generate sufficient income to cover household expenses for himself, his partner and their two sons.

Edwin is requesting a loan to buy a solar energy system because they do not have basic services in his area and solar energy would be very useful, since he would not have to continue using candles, oil lamps and torches for illumination in his home, which is what they have been using all of this time. He notes that his children have been affected by the smoke produced by these types of products. A solar energy system will enable his family to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a solar energy system.

loans.name: Eduardo Reginaldo

texts.es:
Eduardo, se dedica a la jardinería, siembra de cultivo agrícola, él vive con su hija y nieto, su trabajo es la jardinería, siembra de plantas ornamentales, y mantenimiento de jardines en las casas particulares y empresas, dándoles diferentes formas decorativas.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de una moto cierra,   ya que esta es su principal herramienta para ofrecer a los clientes el servicio de la jardinería, esta compra será muy provechosa para Eduardo ya que podrá continuar con su oficio.
El propósito de él es ayudar a su hija y nieto, cubriendo las necesidades más urgentes del hogar.
texts.en:
Eduardo works as a gardener and also grows crops.  He lives with his daughter and grandson. He plants ornamental plants, and maintains gardens for private homes and businesses, giving them different decorative shapes.

At this time, he is applying for a loan to buy a power saw, as this is the main tool he uses in providing gardening services to his customers. This purchase will be very beneficial for Eduardo, as he will be able to keep doing his trade. His purpose is to help his daughter and grandson, and cover the basic household necessities.

loans.use: To buy a power saw, in order to offer gardening services.

loans.name: Gladys Miluska

texts.es:
Gladys tiene 28 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijo en casa de sus padres, cuenta con sólo servicio de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona la actividad que desarrollan es la agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

Gladys desde hace unos años cuenta con una mototaxi que es de su propiedad, la misma que maneja su esposo realizando servicio de transporte público en su mototaxi (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo máximo de 3 personas) la cual trabaja diariamente mañana y tarde, con las ganancias que obtenga podrá solventar sus gastos y necesidades familiares.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para renovar su carpa, SOAT que se le ha vencido y realizar unos arreglos en su vivienda, con los ingresos que adquiera podrá pagar su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Gladys es una persona trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo junto con su esposo tratan de salir adelante como una familia.
texts.en:
Gladys is 28 years old and she lives with her husband and son in her parents’ house which is only supplied with electricity. It is located in the rural area of the Department of Lambayeque. The activities carried out in this area are agriculture, livestock and tourism.

For the past few years Gladys has relied on a mototaxi which she owns. Her husband also uses it to provide public transport services (for short journeys, with a maximum capacity of 3 people) and he works every morning and afternoon. With the profits he earns, he is able to pay the bills and provide for his family.

She has applied for a loan for 2000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to renovate the awning, renew the SOAT insurance, which is due to be paid, and carry out some repairs to her home. With the income that she would make, she will be able to pay her loan off and improve her family’s quality of life. Gladys is a hard-working person who, together with her husband, is making a huge effort to get ahead as a family.

loans.use: to renovate the awning, renew the SOAT insurance on her mototaxi and carry out some repairs in her home

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: La Srita Celia se dedica desde hace dos años a la venta de artesanías y quiere comprar mas mercancía para que sus ingresos aumenten,  ella esta contenta de habernos encontrado porque así  podrá  llevar a cabo su proyecto ya que   ve  en el crédito  la posibilidad  de  hacer  crecer  su  negocio  ofreciéndoles a  su  clientes  mayor   variedad  de  productos  y  el excelente  servicio  que  la  caracteriza.
texts.en: Celia has worked for two years selling arts and crafts and would like to buy more stock in order to increase her income. She is happy to have found us because she now will be able to carry out her project. The loan will give her the opportunity to grow her business by offering her customers a greater variety of products, along with the excellent service she is known for.

loans.use: buy merchandise.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
el sr. Jose Luis tiene 40 años de edad y se dedica al cultivo y producción de café, sus padres le enseñaron desde pequeño con dicha labor, ahora tiene mucha experiencia en esta actividad, siendo esta la herencia de sus padres. También se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos tales como maíz y frijoles, dichas actividades le  han sustentado durante mucho tiempo, Vive en unión libre y con su compañera de hogar han proceado 4 hijos.
El Sr. Jose solicita un credito el cual sera utilizado para comprar una planta de energía solar ya que desea tener los beneficios que esta representa.
con dicha planta piensa iluminar su casa y poner un televisor para entretenimiento de su familia.
texts.en:
Sr. Jose Luis is 40 years old and is a coffee grower, a skill he learned from his parents when he was small. Now he has a lot of experience as a coffee producer, which he views as a legacy from his parents. He also cultivates basic grains, such as corn and beans. Both coffee and basic grains have been sources of income for him for a long time. He lives with his common law wife with whom he has 4 children.

Jose Luis is requesting a loan to buy a solar energy system because he wants to have the benefits this will bring. He intends to illuminate his house and install a television for his family’s entertainment.

loans.use: to buy a solar energy system.

loans.name: Odile

texts.en: Odette has a three-year-old child. She is 35 years old. She sells foodstuffs and she has been selling foodstuffs for the past five years. This business has enabled her improve her standard of living and she also managed to put aside some savings. She needs a loan to buy more foodstuffs for sale in order to make more profits.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs for sale.

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Don Francisco, vive junto a su esposa y tres hijos de 33, 25 y 21 años de edad, él se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas desde hace 12 años, estos cultivos le han ayudado a mantener el hogar.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar materiales para sembrar nuevamente, ya que como esta actividad es la que le provee ingresos, él no quiere dejar de cultivar, por lo que necesita adquirir abono para el cultivo.
Las aspiraciones de don Francisco es realizar cada vez mejor las cosechas, continuar produciendo la tierra para que también su familia siga contando con esta fuente de ingreso.
texts.en:
Francisco lives with his wife and three children, ages 33, 25, and 21.  He has been growing vegetables for 12 years. These crops have helped him support his family. 

Now he is applying for a loan to buy supplies for planting once again, since this is how he earns income.  He doesn't want to stop farming and this is why he needs to acquire fertilizer for his crops.  

Francisco's ambition is to produce better and better harvests,  ensuring that his land remains productive, so that his family continues to have this source of income.

loans.use: To buy crop fertilizer.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose is a mother of four children who are aged 7-17 years. Rose is 47 years old. She owns a general store in which she sells different kinds of foodstuffs such as rice, beans, sorghum and peanuts. She has been doing this business for the past 10 years. This business has enabled her to meet all her needs and she has also improved her standard of living. She needs a loan to buy more foodstuffs and make more profit.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs  for sale.

loans.name: Claudia  Marisela

texts.es: La Sra. Claudia es una señora muy responsable y seria en su trabajo, junto con su esposo el Sr. Pedro, trabajan día a día para el sustento de su familia, la Sra Claudia prepara platillos de comida variada para vender y así ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar, ella requiere ahora invertir en la compra de mercancía para preparar diferentes  platillos y a si poder complacer a todos sus clientes brindándoles  la posibilidad  de que  su  numero de  clientes  aumente.
texts.en: Claudia is a very responsible woman who is very serious about her work.  She and her husband, Pedro, work together day to day to support their family.  Claudia makes various dishes to sell and help her husband with household expenses.  She now needs to invest in the purchase of merchandise to prepare the various dishes and to be able to satisfy customer demand thereby creating the possibility that the number of her customers might increase.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Jorge Antonio

texts.es:
el joven Jorge tiene 25 años de edad y se dedica al cultivo de café, contando con 6 años de experiencia en dicha actividad, misma que le genera ingresos para cubrir las necesidades y obligaciones que tiene en su hogar, vive en unión libre y es padre de un hijo.   
El joven Jorge solicita un credito para poder cubrir lo que es la compra de una planta de energia solar, siendo este su mayor anhelo para él y su familia, ya que desean contar con este servicio para una mejor calidad de vida para su familia, desea eliminar todos los candiles que utiliza para la iluminacion de su casa, estos aparatos no son buenos para la salud ya que despiden un humo daniño para las vias respiratorias.
ademas con la casa iluminada hay mas tiempo por las noches para realizar actividades con su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge, 25, is a young man dedicated to growing coffee.  He has six years’ experience in this line of work which generates income to cover his needs and obligations he has at home; he’s in a common law relationship and is the father of a son.

Jorge is asking for a loan to cover the purchase of a solar electric generator which is a great desire of himself and his family because they’d like to have electricity for better quality of life.  He’d like to do away with all the candles he uses to light his house because they are not healthy in that they produce smoke that’s harmful to respiratory systems.  Besides, a well-lighted house allows for more family activities at night.

loans.use: to buy a solar electricity generator.

loans.name: La Presa Group

texts.es:
Don Juan tiene 48 años de edad el esta casado y tiene dos hijos que dependen de el los cuales estudian en la primaria, el vive cerca de la zona arqueológica de su localidad. Comenta que tiene en su casa un puesto de dulces y el quisiera hacer un puesto mas grande y vender un poco de abarrotes, tiene con su negocio aproximadamente 3 años y dice que puso ese puesto para tener una entrada mas de ganancias, el también se dedica al cultivo de aguacate y tiene una huerta a lado  de su casa. El esta pidiendo un crédito para hacer crecer su negocio el surtirá en diferentes tiendas de una población mas grande cerca de donde vive, comprara dulces de diferentes variedades y un poco de papel higiénico, jabón, cloro etc. lo que mas le piden sus vecinos que venda. El esta muy agradecido por el crédito que le harán por que así podrá darles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
Los otros cinco integrantes del grupo se llaman Gregoria, Yeimi, Alejandrina, Ana Elsa, Fidelina, ellas invertirán su crédito en la compra de hilo, ganchos materia prima para hacer bolsas bordadas artesanales, frutas y legumbres, fritangas y dulces para su venta.
texts.en:
Juan, 48, is married and has two dependent children going to elementary school.  He lives near a local archaeological zone.  He comments that he has a candy stand at home and he’d like to enlarge it and sell a few groceries.  He’s had his business for about three years and he says that he set up his stand to have an additional source of profits.  He also farms avocadoes and has an orchard next to his house.

He is asking for the loan to make his business grow.  He will stock up at various stores in one of the larger towns nearby.  He will buy assorted candies, a bit of toilet paper, soap, chlorine bleach; whatever his neighbors most ask him to sell.  He is very grateful for the loan he’ll get because it will allow him to provide his children with a better quality of life.

The other five group members are called: Gregoria, Yeimi, Alejandrina, Ana Elsa and Fidelina.  They will use their loan to buy thread, hooks and raw materials to make embroidered artisanal bags, to buy fruits and vegetables, fried snacks and candy to sell.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise.

loans.name: Jose Lucio

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y sus hijas de 12 y 16 años de edad, es empleado de un agroservicio, trabaja como vendedor desde hace 3 años, con su sueldo logra dar lo necesario en su hogar, apoyándose de su esposa para salir adelante.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para pagar mecánico, pues su vehículo presenta desperfectos y para darle mantenimiento debe hacer algunas reparaciones.
El objetivo de José es trabajar de la mejor manera, apoyar a sus hijas en los estudios y que puedan superarse.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and daughters who are 12 and 16 years old.  He’s been employed at a farming supplies firm as a salesman for the last three years.  He manages to provide the basics for his home with his salary relying on his wife to help him get ahead.

At present, he needs a loan to pay a mechanic because his vehicle is having some problems and he has to service it and do some repairs.

José’s goal is to work the best way possible and support the education of his daughters so that they will be able to improve themselves.

loans.use: to pay auto repair costs.

loans.name: Selvin Adonai

texts.es:
el joven Selvin tiene 21 años de edad y se dedica al cultivo de café, tiene 2 años de experiencia en dicha actividad, además del cultivo de café también cuenta con una pulpería donde vende productos de consumo diario, estas actividades le han generado ingresos para cubrir las nesecidades de su familia.
Selvin vive en unión libre y esta solicitando un credito para comprar una planta de energía solar, porque  necesita de este servicio que le será de mucha utilidad, ya que podra atender a sus clientes que llegan a comprar a su pulperia por las noches.
texts.en:
Selvin is 21 and has been growing coffee for 2 years.  Besides growing coffee, he also has a convenience store where he sells everyday products.  These activities have generated income for him to cover his family's needs.

Selvin lives in a common-law marriage and is requesting a loan to buy a solar energy panel.  He needs this service because it will be useful to him since he will be able to serve his customers who come to his store to shop at night.

loans.use: to buy a solar energy panel.

loans.name: Joel

texts.es: El Sr. Joel solicita su préstamo mas que nada por que desea construir  un cuarto en la planta baja de su  domicilio , ya que el se preocupa por el bienestar de su familia, ya  que  el esta casado y tiene  dos hijos para  los cuales  desea  lo mejor afortunadamente   cuenta con el apoyo incondicional de  su esposo   la  cual  también  trabaja ,  agradecen   el apoyo  brindado  para  la realización de su proyecto  ya  que  ve  en  el crédito  la posibilidad  de   brindar  a  su  familia  una  mayor  comodidad.
texts.en: Mr. Joel is requesting a loan because he wants to build a room on the ground floor of his home, since he is looking out for his family's well-being. He is married and has two children, and he wants the best for them. Fortunately, he has his wife's unconditional support. She also works. They are grateful for the support offered for the completion of their project. Joel sees this loan as an opportunity to offer his family greater comfort.

loans.use: to expand the ground floor of his home.

loans.name: Cecilia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Cecilia, se dedica a la venta de verduras, vive con su familia y tiene una hija de 12 años, el negocio lo tiene desde hace un año, su familia le apoya mucho para atenderlo.
Ella necesita realizar la compra de plátanos, güisquil, tomates, cebollas, papas, para incrementar la mercadería, esta inversión le ayudara para tener mayor variedad y frutas frescas.
El propósito de ella es ser una microempresaria de éxito, mejorar el negocio, aumentar los ingresos al hogar y ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Cecilia sells vegetables. She lives with her family and has one 12-year-old daughter. She has had her business for one year, and her family helps her greatly in tending to it.
She needs to buy plantains, pear squash, tomatoes, onions, and potatoes in order to increase her merchandise. This investment will help her to have a greater variety, and to have fresh fruits.
She intends to be a successful microentrepreneur, to improve her business, to increase her household income, and to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy plantains, pear squash, tomatoes, onions, potatoes.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es:
el sr. Rafael tiene 28  años de edad y se dedica  al cultivo de café, cuenta  con  más de 5 años de experiencia, vive en union libre y han procrado un hijo.
El  Sr. Rafael esta solicitando un prestamo para la compra de una planta de energía solar  ya  que  en la zona donde vive no cuentan con este servicio y este sera de mucha utilidad en su vivienda siendo un recurso basico con el cual podra iluminar su casa por las noches sin tener que utilizar candiles.
texts.en:
Rafael, 28, is a coffee grower.  He has more than five years’ experience.  He’s in a common law relationship and has a son.

Rafael is asking for a loan to buy a solar powered electric generator because the zone he lives in does not have electricity and this would be of great use to his house since it’s a basic resource and he’d be able to light his house at night without having to use candles.

loans.use: to buy a solar powered electric generator.

loans.name: Genesis Group

texts.en:
Luisa is one of the members of the “Genesis”. The members are micro-entrepreneurs who sell clothing, assorted merchandise, shoes, crafts and bread. Some members also have businesses such as a beauty salon or a grocery store. The businesses are located mainly in the city of El Seybo, a farming community in the northeast of the country.

Luisa makes her home in a simple structure with her two children. She tells us that her most difficult challenge is to raise her children and educate them, even while she is working and taking income home. They are attending school while she is walking around in different communities to sell her products. She enjoys being at her home. She sells miscellaneous products like clothes, underwear and cosmetics.

Luisa is very excited about receiving her 4th loan from Esperanza Internacional, having repaid her previous three loans satisfactorily and taking an important step toward her business’s growth. She will use this new loan to buy pants, T-shirts, skirts, blouses and shirts. She will use the profits to cover her family expenses and to reinvest in her business. She thanks all of you for your support.

In this loan, we are adding two pictures to complete a picture with most of the 25 members since it was impossible to get a photo that captured everyone.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, vive con su esposo y dos hijos D. 25 y 23 años D. edad, se dedica a la venta D. meriendas, desD. hace dos años administra el negocio, paga dos empleadas que le ayudan a atenderlo y en ocasiones salen a vender D. forma ambulante.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra D. carnes, pollo, frijoles, arroz, azúcar, sal y condimentos, para el negocio, esta compra le ayudara para continuar trabajando y ofreciendo a los clientes ricos menús. 
Su visión es algún día tener un comedor amplio, con capacidad para muchas personas, mejorar su servicio capacitándose en cocina y superarse con su familia.
texts.en:
María lives with her husband and two children, ages 25 and 23. She sells light meals and has been in business for two years. Maria has two employees who help her and manage the business during those occasions when she goes out to sell on the street.

She is requesting a loan to buy meats, chicken, beans, rice, sugar, salt, and condiments for her business. This purchase will allow her to continue working and offering her rich dishes to her customers. Her vision is to someday have a spacious diner that can accommodate many people. María also hopes to improve her service, take some cooking courses, and excel in her family life.

loans.use: to buy meats, chicken, beans, rice, sugar, salt, and condiments.

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es:
la sra. Teofila tiene 60 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de lacteos, tiene 5 años de tener su negocio, dicha actividad le genera ingresos para cubrir las necesidades y obligaciones que tiene en su hogar, teofila esta casada y es madre de 5 hijos de los que ya solo depende una hija.   
La Sra. Teofila  utilizara el credito para capital de trabajo ya que no cuenta con el efectivo suficiente para comprar los lacteos, ya que la mayor parte de los productos han subido de precio y se tiene que hacer mayor inversión.
texts.en:
Sra. Teofila is 60 years old and sells dairy products. She has been in business for five years and says that the income she generates is used to cover her necessities and household obligations. Teofila is married and the mother of five children. Only one daughter is still a dependent.

Sra. Teofila will use this loan as operating capital since she does not have sufficient funds for buying dairy products. Since most of her products have gone up in price, she must now make a greater investment.

loans.use: to buy hard cheese, soft cheese, and butter.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase compost and pest treatments.

loans.name: Maria Irene

texts.es:
la sra. Maria Irene tiene 40 años de edad, cuenta con una Pequeña tienda en donde vende calzado, ropa nueva, cosméticos, productos agropecuarios e insumos para la caficultura,  su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitación, con las ganancias que le genera dicha actividad percibe ingresos para cubrir las necesidades y obligaciones que tiene en su hogar, esta casada y es madre de 3 hijos los cuales estudian en centros educativos de su comunidad. 
La Sra. Maria Irene utilizara el credito para comprar mercaderia y asi surtirlo, ya que por los momentos no cuenta con el efectivo suficiente para realizar las compras de mercadería y agro insumos.
su meta es hacer crecer su negocio y darles una buena calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Sra. Maria Irene is 40 years old and has a small store where she sells shoes, new clothing, cosmetics, agricultural products, and supplies for growing coffee. Her business is located in her home. With the earnings she generates, Maria is able to cover her needs and household obligations. She is married and the mother of three children who attend schools in her community.

Sra. Maria Irene will utilize this loan to buy merchandise to restock her store. At the moment, she does not have enough cash to make purchases of merchandise and farming supplies. Her goals are to grow her business and to provide a good quality of life for her children.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, hair conditioners, light bulbs, shoes, insecticides, and honey.

loans.name: Carla Elizabeth

texts.es:
Carla, administra un comedor, vive con su esposo y su hija de un año de edad, ella aprendió el negocio por su madre, quien inicio con el comedor pero que se lo heredo para que le diera continuidad.
Actualmente necesita un mostrador de comida, que lo adquirirá por medio de un préstamo, esta será una gran inversión para el negocio, ya que contara con una herramienta más y muy valiosa donde podra exhibir los alimentos que prepara para la venta.
La aspiración de Carla es que su negocio sea más rentable, con mayor afluencia de clientes.
texts.en:
Carla manages a diner. She lives with her husband and one-year-old daughter. Carla learned this business from her mother, who started the diner but later passed it on to her so that the business could continue.

At the moment, she needs a food buffet that she will acquire through the use of this loan. This will be a great investment for her business because she will have another piece of valuable equipment that will allow her to display the food that she prepares for sale.

Carla’s aspiration is to have a more profitable business and increased customer traffic.

loans.use: to purchase a food buffet.

loans.name: Darlin Nohemi

texts.es:
la joven Darlin Nohemí tiene 21 años de edad, cuenta con un negocio de venta de ropa nueva, calzado y cosméticos, su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitación, con las ganancias que le genera dicha actividad percibe ingresos para cubrir las necesidades y obligaciones que tiene en su hogar, convive en unión libre y es madre de una niña.   
Darlin Nohemí utilizara el credito para comprar vestidos, blusas, jeans, sandalias y zapatos, ya que por los momentos no cuenta con el efectivo suficiente para realizar las compras para surtir su negocio, se aproxima la temporada de cosecha de granos básicos y esta epoca es muy buena y muchas personas compran ropa para sus hijos, desea estar preparada para las exigencias de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Darlin Nohemí is a young woman who is 21 years of age. She has a business selling new clothes, shoes, and cosmetics. Her business is located in her home. With the income she generates from her business, Darlin is able to cover her needs and household obligations. She is in a common-law marriage and the mother of one daughter.

Darlin Nohemí will use this loan to buy dresses, blouses, jeans, sandals, and shoes. At the moment, she does not have enough cash to purchase these items to restock her business. The upcoming grain harvest is a good season for her since many people buy clothes for their children. She wants to be prepared in order to meet the demands of her customers.

loans.use: to buy dresses, blouses, jeans, sandals, and shoes for girls.

loans.name: Gloria Mercedes

texts.es:
Gloria, se dedica a la venta de mariscos, vive con su esposo y un hijo de 5 años de edad, ella lleva 7 años en el negocio, comercializando mariscos para poder contribuir a los gastos del hogar.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mariscos, pescado seco y fresco, camarones, cangrejos, con estos podrá continuar comercializando con los clientes, ofreciendo productos frescos.
El propósito de ella es ser cada día mejor comerciante, ofrecer para los clientes los productos frescos atendiendo la demanda.
texts.en:
Gloria sells seafood. She lives with her husband and five-year-old son. Gloria has been selling seafood for seven years in order to contribute toward the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to buy shellfish, fish (dried and fresh), shrimp, and crabs. This will allow her to continue selling to her customers and offering them fresh products. Her goal is to become a better merchant each day by offering her customers fresh products and meeting their demands.

loans.use: to buy shellfish, fish (dried and fresh), shrimp, and crabs.

loans.name: El Buen Pastor Group

texts.es: El banco Comunal El Buen Pastor  se formó con la unión de varias personas. Todas las integrantes del grupo desarrollan actividades de forma conjunta y dentro de un ambiente de solidaridad y respeto mutuo. Se definen como mujeres jefas de familia, que luchan día a día por obtener mayores ingresos, para que de esa forma puedan brindarles a sus hijos y familiares una vida mejor. La Señora Catalina es se dedica a la venta de cuajada y gallinas, desde hace mas de 30 años. Sueña con algún día su hija sea una profesional.Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de gallinas y cuajadas.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “El Buen Pastor” (The Good Shepherd) was formed as a result of several individuals joining together. All of the members work together in their activities in an atmosphere that promotes solidarity and mutual respect. They define themselves as heads of households who strive day after day to earn more income so that they can provide their children and relatives a better life.

Sra. Catalina has been selling curds and hens for more than 30 years. Her dream is to someday see her daughter become a professional. She is requesting a loan to buy hens and curds.

loans.use: to buy hens and curds.

loans.name: Isabel Graciela

texts.es:
Isabel  D. 54 años D. edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicio básicos, ubicada en el distrito D. Guadalupe que pertenece al departamento D. La Libertad.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

DesD. hace varios años Isabel se dedica la venta D. productos D. primera necesidad (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, etc) golosinas y bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en su misma casa para su comodidad y seguridad, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta D. sus productos  trata D. cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar su nivel D. vida.

Para poder  implementar su negocio ha solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  D. 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal D. que su negocio crezca y tenga productos más surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.  Isabel es una persona responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por el bienestar D. su familia.
texts.en:
Isabel is 54 years old and lives with her family in a home that they own. They have all the basic services. Isabel resides in the District of Guadalupe, which is part of the Department of La Libertad. This area is known for its businesses that involve agriculture and livestock breeding.

For several years Isabel has been selling basic necessities such as milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, candy, and beverages. Her business is located in her home so that she can be comfortable and secure. With the income she earns from selling these products, Isabel is able to cover all of her expenses and improve her standard of living.

To keep her business in operation, she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1500 PEN. The money will be used to buy more merchandise. Her ideal wish for her business is to grow and be stocked with more products to offer to her customers. Isabel is a responsible, dedicated, and hardworking individual who is concerned about the welfare of her family.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Rosa Lastenia

texts.es:
la sra. Rosa Lastenia tiene 40 años de edad,  cuenta con una carnicería, tiene 4 años de experiencia en dicha actividad, misma que le genera ingresos para cubrir las necesidades y obligaciones que tiene en su hogar, Rosa es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijas, todas estudian en el centro educativo público del municipio de las Trojes.   
La Sra. Rosa Lastenia utilizara el credito para la compra de reses vivas para sacrificarlas y ponerlas a la venta en sus carnicería.
su meta es graduar a sus hijas de la universidad.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosa Lastenia is 40 years old.  She has a butcher shop.  Rosa has four years of experience in this line of work.  She is able to generate income to cover the needs and obligations of her household.  Rosa is a single mother with three daughters, all of whom are studying at a public school in the town of Las Trojes.  

Sra. Rosa will use this loan to buy beef cattle that she will sacrifice and sell in her butcher shop.  Her goal is to see her daughters graduate from the university.

loans.use: to buy beef cattle.

loans.name: Jose Israel

texts.es:
José, es empleado y agricultor, es soltero, vive con su madre, él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 8 años y también es empleado, trabaja todos los días de 7:00am a 4:00pm, hasta la fecha no ha tenido dificultades atendiendo las dos ocupaciones al mismo tiempo.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de fertilizantes y herbicidas para las plagas, con estos materiales podrá dar un cuido adecuado a la siembra y garantizar una mejor producción de maíz para su familia.
El objetivo de José es el futuro tener su propia casa, apoyar a su madre con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
José is an employee and also a farmer.  He’s single living with his mother.  He’s been farming for the last 8 years and he’s also employed; he works daily from 7am until 4pm.  To date, he’s had no problem doing both jobs simultaneously.

He’s asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and herbicide.  These supplies will make it possible for him to provide adequate care to his crops and guarantee a better corn harvest for his family.

José’s goal for the future is to have a house of his own and to help his mother with household expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs and feed concentrate.

loans.name: Vilma Teresa

texts.es:
Vilma, vive junto a su esposo y tienen dos hijas D. 30 y 21 años D. edad, ella se dedica a la venta D. ropa y floristería desD. hace 3 años atendiendo su negocio todos los días ocho horas diarias, la floristería la aprendió en unas clases impartidas cerca D. su casa. 
Ella necesita un préstamo pues quiere invertir en la compra D. blusas, faldas, ropa para niños y  en materiales para la elaboración D. flores como papel, colorante, alambre y espelma, dicha compre le ayudara para fortalecer los dos negocios.
Aspira crecer en el negocio, pues así atraerá a los clientes y aumentaran las ventas y las ganancias para mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia.
texts.en:
Vilma lives with her husband; they have two daughters who are 30 and 21 years old.  She sells clothes and has been a florist for the last three years.  She works every day, 8 hours per day.  She learned to be a florist taking some courses that were taught nearby.

She needs a loan because she wants to buy blouses, skirts and children’s clothes as well as materials to make flowers like paper, dye, wire and florist foam.  This purchase will help her strengthen both businesses.  She aspires to grow in business to attract more customers and increase sales; profits will improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es:
Marisol es una madre de familia de 33 años, vive en casa de sus padres junto a sus hijos, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí de la provincia de Chiclayo.  Zona de alta actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace algunos años Marisol se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal y domèstico, su negocio lo tiene en su casa para su comodidad, cuenta con su propia clientela, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá solventar las necesidades de sus hijos.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más productos de uso personal y domèstico  para exhibir y vender a su clientela, así podrá obtener mayores ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Marisol es una mujer trabajadora y una madre que siempre trata que su familia salga adelante a pesar de las dificultades que a veces se presentan en la vida.
texts.en:
Marisol is a 33-year-old mother living with her children in her parents’ house which has all basic utilities and is located in the rural part of Cayaltí District, Chiclayo Province.  This is a zone of intense farming and animal husbandry.

For several years now, Marisol has been selling personal use and home use products.  Her business is located at home for her convenience.  She has her own established clientele and income she earns allows her to cover her children’s needs.

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to buy more personal use and domestic use products to display and sell to her clientele so that she can earn higher profits to have a better quality of life.  Marisol is a hardworking woman and a mother who always tries to strive so that her family can get ahead despite the difficulties life sometimes presents.

loans.use: to buy personal use and home use products to sell.

loans.name: Eva Concepcion

texts.es:
la sra. Eva Concepción tiene 64 años de edad, cuenta con una Pulpería en donde vende productos de consumo diario, su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitación y tiene 13 años de experiencia en este tipo de negocio, las ganancias que le genera dicha actividad cubre las necesidades y obligaciones que tiene en su hogar, es madre soltera y tiene 4 hijos de los cuales solo uno depende de ella. 
La Sra. Eva Concepción utilizara el credito para la compra de abarroteria para surtir su negocio, por los momentos no cuenta con el efectivo suficiente para realizar las compras de mercadería y abarrotaría para surtir su negocio y asi sus  mejorar las ventas y sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Eva Concepcion is 64 years old, and has a convenience store where she sells dairy products. Her business is located in her home and she has 13 years of experience in this business.  The profits generated by tourism covers the needs and obligations she has in her home.  Eva Concepcion is a single mother and has 4 children who depend only on her.

Eva Concepcion will use the loan to purchase goods to stock her grocery store business.  She currently does not have sufficient cash to purchase grocery and convenience store goods to stock her business, so with the loan, she will have better sales and profits.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, sugar, butter, oil, margarine, flour, bread, cookies, coffee, churros, soft drinks, cereal, powdered milk, soap, and toilet paper.

loans.name: Cantalicia

texts.es:
Cantalicia, se dedica al comercio de cosméticos, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 20 y 16 años de edad, ella aprendió el comercio de cosméticos por influencia de unas amigas, lleva 6 años en el negocio, trabaja de 2:00pm a 5:00pm.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de cosméticos como: maquillaje, labiales, rubor, sombras, lápiz de ojos, este préstamo la ayudara para mejorar el inventario de materiales para ofrecer a los clientes, nuevos estilos y colores de maquillajes, su única dificultad es que vende al crédito y los clientes no pagan a tiempo la deuda.
El propósito de Cantalicia es trabajar fuerte para sacar adelante a su familia, apoyando a sus hijos y darles la oportunidad de estudiar para que puedan superarse.
texts.en:
Cantalicia works in cosmetic sales. She lives with her husband and two children, who are 20 and 16 years old. She learned the cosmetics sales business through some friends, and she has been in the business for 6 years. She works from 2 pm to 5 pm.

She is applying for a loan to purchase cosmetics such as make-up, lipsticks, blush, eye shadow, and eye liner. This loan will help her improve the inventory that she offers to customers, with new styles and colors of makeup. Her only difficulty is that she sells on credit, and her customers don't pay their debts on time.

Cantalicia's intention is to work hard to raise her family, supporting her children and giving them a good opportunity to study so that they can aim ever higher.

loans.use: to buy products to sell: make-up, lipstick, blush, eye shadow, and eye liner

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es:
Reina, es empleada y comercializa con comida rápida como lo es: hamburguesas, tortas mexicanas y panes con pollo, ella vive en compañía D. su esposo y sus hijos, todos trabajan en el hogar; Reina inicio con el negocio con el apoyo D. una D. sus hijas, trabajan por las tardes en su propia casa.
Actualmente necesita comprar ingredientes para realizar la venta, específicamente, pan normal, para tortas y  para hamburguesas, pollo, jamón, mortadela, aceite, condimentos y gaseosas. La inversión será muy provechosa para el negocio y para ella, ya que contara con lo necesario para atender la demanda.
Su aspiración es ser una microempresaria estable, contar con la ayuda D. préstamos para el desarrollo del negocio y apoyar a su familia en todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Reina is employed and sells fast food such as hamburgers, Mexican-style sandwiches, and Salvadoran chicken sandwiches. She lives with her husband and children, all of whom work at home. Reina started her business with the help of one of her daughters. They work in the afternoons at her home.

At the moment, she needs to buy ingredients for selling her food, specifically regular bread, buns for Mexican-style sandwiches and hamburgers, chicken, ham, mortadella, oil, condiments, and sodas. This investment will be advantageous for her and her business because she will have what she needs to meet the demand.

Her aspiration is to have a stable microenterprise. With the help of these loans, Reina will be able to develop her business and proviD. her family everything they need.

loans.use: to buy regular bread, buns for Mexican-style sandwiches and hamburgers, chicken, ham, mortadella, oil, condiments, and sodas.

loans.name: Siomara Esperanza

texts.es:
Siomara, vive con dos hijas una de dos años y la otra de 5, ella se dedica  a la venta de variedades, ropa, perfumería, cosméticos y accesorios de fantasía, ella aprendió de su madre a ser comerciante, desde muy joven cuenta con experiencia.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materia prima para hacer pan, como harina, azúcar y leche, ya que piensa ofrecer a los clientes pan, el préstamo le ayudara para ofrecer un nuevo producto y mejorar las ventas.
El objetivo de Siomara es  montar una cafetería y junto mantener el bazar de variedades, desarrollándose como comerciante y mejorando las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Siomara lives with her two daughters, ages 1 and 5. She sells a variety of goods such as clothing, perfumes, cosmetics, and costume jewelry. She learned the retail trade from her mother and has been gaining experience since she was a young girl.

At the moment, she is requesting a loan to buy ingredients for making bread such as flour, sugar, and milk. She plans to offer bread to her customers. This loan will allow her to offer a new product and improve her sales.

Siomara’s goal is to open a cafeteria while maintaining her variety store. She will continue to develop as a businesswoman and improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for making bread.

loans.name: Clorinda

texts.es:
la sra. Clorinda tiene 48 años de edad y cuenta con puesto de venta de verduras ubicado en su casa de habitación, sus productos los compra a los diferentes agricultores locales y otros que le visitan desde la ciudad de Danlí, con las ganancias que le genera dicha actividad cubre las necesidades y obligaciones que tiene en su hogar, es madre soltera y tiene 4 hijos, 2 los cuales estudian en centros educativos públicos del municipio de las Trojes.     
La Sra. Clorinda utilizara el credito para la compra de verduras para surtir su negocio, este tipo de alimentos se vende muy bien ya que son saludables y muy sabrosos, casi todas las personas de esta comunidad comen verduras en el almuerzo y la cena.
texts.en:
Sra. Clorinda is 48 years old and manages a vegetable stand at her home. She buys her products from different farmers in the area and others who visit from the city of Danlí. With the earnings she generates, Clorinda is able to provide for her needs and meet the household obligations. She is a single mother with four children, two of whom are studying at schools in the town of Las Trojes.

Sra. Clorinda will use this loan to buy vegetables to restock her business. This type of food sells very well because it is healthy and quite flavorful. Almost every person in her community eats vegetables for lunch and dinner.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, cassava, tomatoes, onions, green chiles, lemons, carrots, cabbages, lettuce, and cucumbers.

loans.name: Las Nochebuenas Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "LAS NOCHEBUENAS" y se ubica en el Estado de México; la comunidad se distingue por sus árboles frutales y sus grandes campos verde, por su gente trabajadora y emprendedora. El grupo esta conformado por nueve integrantes. La señora Beatriz es una de las integrantes del grupo. Inició su negocio hace 1 año y afortunadamente le ha ido muy bien, ella se dedica a la venta de papeleria y mochilas. Solicita el prestamo para surtir su negocio con lo cul va a compar mochilas y articulos de papeleria, así tener una gran variedad de artículos que ofrecer a sus clientes; sobre todo en este regreso a clases donde necesita más inversion para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Ella tiene 27 años, estudió hasta la secundaria, es casada, tiene  tres hijos de 7, 6, y 4 años de edad. Ella desea brindarles educación a sus hijos y seguir trabajando para darles una mejor calidad de vida y apoyar a su esposo en los gastos de la casa.
texts.en:
This group is called “Las Nochebuenas” (The Poinsettias) and is located in the State of Mexico. Their community is known for its fruit trees, its large green fields, and the hardworking and enterprising people. Nine members make up this group.

Sra. Beatriz is one of the group’s members. She started her business one year ago and fortunately she has done very well. Beatriz sells stationery and backpacks. She is requesting a loan to restock her business by purchasing backpacks and stationery items so that she will have a wide variety of products to offer to her customers. Since all of the classes are starting again, Beatriz needs more money to invest so that she can satisfy the needs of her customers.

She is 27 years old and has a high school education. Beatriz is married and has three children (ages 7, 6, and 4). She wants to provide her children an education and continue her work so that they can have a better quality of life. In addition, she wants to help her husband with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy stationery items and backpacks.

loans.name: Jessica Yanina

texts.es:
la sra. Jessica Yanina tiene 32 años de edad,  cuenta con un negocio de venta de abarrotaría,con las ganancias que le genera dicha actividad cubre las necesidades y obligaciones que tiene en su hogar, Jessica es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijas, todas estudian en centro educativo público del municipio de las Trojes.   
La Sra. Jessica Yanina utilizara el credito para la compra de abarroteria y asi surtir mas su negocio, las ventas han mejorado y las exigencias de sus clientes son grandes.
su meta es graduar a sus hijas y hacerlas profesionales.
texts.en:
Sra. Jessica Yanina is 32 years old and has a grocery business.  With the income that she generates from this activity, she is able to cover the needs and obligations of her household.  Jessica is a single mother with three daughters, all of whom are studying at a public school in the town of Las Trojes.

She will use this loan to buy groceries to restock her business.  Her sales will improve since the demands from her customers have increased.  Her goal is to see her daughters graduate and become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Segundino

texts.es: Segundino tiene 64 años, vive en compañía de su esposa. Desde su niñez se ha dedicado a la agricultura, asimismo tiene 30 años trabajando en la crianza y venta de cuyes. Ambas actividades lo desarrolla en su casa, pues posee una granja, del cual dispone de una área suficiente para albergar cerca de 200 cuyes, de la mismo forma tiene terrenos para cultivar alfalfa u otro alimento que sirva de forraje para sus animales. Es así que día a día alimenta y cuida de sus cuyes asíi como siembra cebada. Ella vio por conveniente intensificarse en la crianza de cuyes por ello se capacita constantemente sobre técnicas adecuadas de crianza que le permiten mejorar en su trabajo, asi logra tener cuyes grandes y de buen peso, caracteristicas que es muy solicitado en el mercado. Ahroa está en aumento la reproducción por ello necesita de más forraje para cubrir la totalidad que tiene. Es la segunda vez que tiene un crédito con MFP,  está muy contento de poder acceder a los créditos que se dan de manera oportuna cuando mas lo necesita, ya que siempre se presentan las oportunidades de desarrollo. El dinero lo invertirá en la compra de semilla de cebada para sembrar y tener mayor abastecimiento de alimento para sus animales.
texts.en:
Segundino is 64 years old and lives with his wife. He has been involved in the agriculture business since childhood. For 30 years, Segundino has been raising and selling guinea pigs. He operates both of his businesses from home. Segundino owns a farm and has sufficient space to accommodate almost 200 guinea pigs. On his land, he grows alfalfa and other crops to use as fodder for his animals. Segundino feeds and cares for his guinea pigs every day and also looks after his barley crop. He saw the need to intensify his efforts in raising guinea pigs, so he is constantly learning new techniques that will help him improve in his work and will result in larger and fatter animals. These characteristics are in great demand in the marketplace. In order to increase production, Segundino needs to acquire more fodder to feed his existing lot of animals.

This is the second time he has received a loan from MFP. Segundino is pleased to access these loans because they will open up opportunities when he needs them the most. He is always presented with opportunities to develop. The money will be invested in the purchase of barley seeds for planting so that he will have a greater reserve of feed for his animals.

loans.use: to purchase barley seeds so that he can produce fodder for his guinea pigs.

loans.name: Lucy's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above are teachers from the small town of Waterloo, near Freetown, Sierra Leone’s capital city. They have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of 5,000,000 SLL in order to meet their immediate financial challenges.

Lucy is the leader of this group of teachers. The 46-year-old was born in Moyamba. She is a widow with three children. Lucy has requested a loan of 1,000,000 SLL in order to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Estrellas Tlahue Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama "ESTRELLAS TLAHUE" ya que las estrellas desprenden un brillo hermoso durante L. noche que las hace unicas y que como las estrellas las integrantes del grupo pretenden distinguirse por ser mujeres que brillan por su esfuerzo en L. busqueda D. conseguir un mejor futuro para sus familias. El grupo esta ubicado en el Estado D. Hidalgo en Mexico. Esta conformado por 11 integrantes. L. señora Aurelia es integrante del grupo, elL. tiene 35 años D. edad, dos hijos D. 2 y 9 años. Se dedica a L. venta D. servilletas que elL. misma borda desD. hace 15 años y que gracias a sus habilidades en  el bordado sus clientas L. han recomendado y D. esa forma han aumenando sus ganancias en este negocio. Solicito el prestamo para poder comprar mas variedad D. hilos, estambres y telas para realizar mas bordados. ElL. comenta que gracias a su negocios que maneja ha podido ofrecer una mejor calidad D. vida a su familia y en el sentido personal se siente realizada al descubrir que tiene L. capacidad D. salir adelante por sus propios medios. Con las ganancias que obtenga serguira ahorrando para cualquier imprevisto e invertir en su negocio.
texts.en:
This group is called “Estrellas Tlahue” (Stars of Tláhuac). Just like the stars that shine brightly at night, the members of this group seek to distinguish themselves as women who shine in their efforts as they seek to proviD. a better future for their families. This group is from the State of Hidalgo in Mexico. There are 11 members.

Sra. Aurelia is a member of the group. She is 35 years and has two children (ages 2 and 9). For the past 15 years, she has been selling napkins that she embroiders herself. Thanks to her embroidery skills, her customers have recommended her and the sales from her business have increased. Aurelia is requesting a loan to buy a variety of threads, yarn, and fabrics for making more embroideries. She says that thanks to her business, she has been able to offer her family a better quality of life. Aurelia experiences personal fulfillment from discovering that she has the capacity to move forward through her own efforts. With the income she earns, Aurelia will continue saving so that she can be prepared for any unexpected emergency and invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy a variety of threads, yarn, and fabrics for making more embroideries.

loans.name: Karina Marilin

texts.es:
Karina tiene 29 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Chepén departamento de La Libertad.  Esta zona la actividad que desarrollan es la agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

Karina desde hace unos años cuenta con una mototaxi que es de su propiedad, la misma que alquila para realizar servicio de transporte público en su mototaxi (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo máximo de 3 personas) la cual la trabajan diariamente mañana y tarde, con las ganancias que obtenga podrá solventar sus gastos y necesidades personales.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles para brindar mantenimiento a su mototaxi y realizar unos arreglos en la casa de sus padres, con los ingresos que adquiera podrá pagar su crédito y mejorar su nivel de vida.  Karina es una persona trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo a comprado su mototaxi para poderse ayudar económicamente y poder apoyar con algunos gastos diarios a sus padres.
texts.en:
29-year old Karina is single and lives with her parents in a house that has water and electricity. It is located in the urban area of Chepén District in the department of La Libertad. The main sources of income in the area are agriculture, animal raising, and tourism.

Karina has owned a motorcycle taxi for several years which she uses to transport up to three passengers for short distances. She works daily, both morning and afternoon, and with the money she earns she pays for her expenses and personal necessities.

Karina has approached Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2500 soles to maintain her vehicle and to make some repairs to her parents' house. She will be able to make the repayments out of her earnings and improve her standard of living. Karina bought her motorcycle taxi through hard work and a great deal of effort so she could support herself financially and help with some of her parents' daily expenses.

loans.use: to maintain her vehicle and make repairs to her parents' house

loans.name: Jicaro En Accion Group

texts.es:
El grupo JICARO EN ACCION estta integrado por cinco miembros, todos se conocen muy bien. El señor Arturo  líder de este grupo se dedica a la venta de leche, leña y compra/venta de ganado,  sus principales clientes son de los alrededores de Jicaro Galán y Valle, es un negocio que le da mucha rentabilidad y ganancias.
El señor Arturo se siente muy bien con su negocio, el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ganado para producir leche y otros derivados.
Los otros integrantes de este grupo son: Melecia que se dedica a la venta de tortillas, Deysi Elizabeth  que se dedica a la sastrería y costura, Rosa Araceli que se dedica a la venta de tortillass y refrescos y Mirna Lorena que tiene como negocio un molino y venta de leña.

El sueño de este grupo es que siempre sus familas esten bien de salud.
texts.en:
The JICARO EN ACCION group has five members who all know each other well. Señor Arturo, leader of the group, earns his living by selling milk, firewood, and buying and selling livestock. His biggest customers live in the vicinity of Jicaro, Galán, and Valle. His business is very profitable and he has a good income from it.

Arturo is happy with the way his business is going. He plans to use the money from the loan to buy cows so he has milk and other products to sell.

The other members of the group are Melecia who sells tortillas, Deysi Elizabeth who has a sewing and tailoring business, Rosa Araceli who sells tortillas and soft drinks, and Mirna Lorena who has a mill and also sells firewood.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy house-building materials (iron, corrugated zinc, nails, etc.) for the construction of a house.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge de 34 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona es agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Jorge se dedica a la agricultura, tiene sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra limón y mango, actividad que realiza desde hace varios años, además de ser un producto consumido diariamente por las personas, una vez que realiza su cosecha lo comercializa en los diferentes mercados de la zona y fuera de ella,  con los ingresos que adquiera puede brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo y esposa.  

A observar que su negocio va creciendo, ha creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1200 nuevos soles para la compra de fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras como su producto y de animales de corral para empezar a criar, con las ganancias que obtenga podrá pagar su crédito y solventar las necesidades diarias de su familia.  Jorge con trabajo y dedicación le brinda lo mejor a su familia, en especial a su hijo tratando de ofrecerle otras oportunidades académicas en un futuro.
texts.en:
Jorge, 34, lives with his family in their own house which has electricity as the only basic utility.  It is located in the rural area of the district of Tambogrande which belongs to the department of Piura.  This is an area known for its agriculture, livestock farming and handicrafts.

Jorge is involved in agriculture and has his own cropland where he grows lemons and mangos.  He has been in this trade for several years.  Apart from consuming his own produce, he sells it at the different markets in the area and out and about.  With the income he earns he can provide a better lifestyle for his wife and son.

Having noticed that his business is growing, he decided to request a loan in the amount of 1,200 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa to buy fertilizer to improve his cropland.  He will also buy small animals to raise.  With the earnings he will be able to pay back the loan and take care of daily household needs for the family.  With hard work and dedication Jorge provides the best for his family, especially for his son to whom he wants to give the best education possible in the future.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer to improve his cropland and small animals.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy house-building materials like cement, sand, stones, etc. for the completion of the house he has begun.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay her college fees.

loans.name: Washington

texts.es: Washington tiene 61 años, vive en en compañía de su esposa en su casa. Las actividades a la que e dedica es, a la crianza de cuyes y al servicio de transporte, actividad que lo ejecuta desde hace 10 años. Él posee un moto taxi, cuyo vehñiculo lo compró con unos ahorros, y ahora lo utiliza dando el servicio de transporte público, cubriendo su ruta local dentro de su distrito. Con la ayuda de su esposa tiene en buen estado su granja de cuyes, además que le ayuda en la venta de estos animales. Por otro lado, siembra pastos, alimentos impresicibles de sus animales, por lo no realiza mucho gasto en la compra. Tiene grandes expectativas para su futuro ya que desea ser un gran productor y tener una de las mejores granjas con prestigio de su zona, a su vez que desea tener a futuro otra unidad mas de mototaxi que le permita tener más ingresos. Es la segunda que tiene un crédito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes. Con el dinero que solicita, comprara cebada en cantidades que será parte de la alimentación de cuyes.
texts.en:
Washington is 61 years old and lives with his wife. He earns his living by raising guinea pigs and driving a taxi, a job he's been doing for ten years. He owns a motorcycle taxi which he bought with his savings and uses it to transport passengers within his local area. With help from his wife, he keeps his guinea pig enclosure in a good condition. She also helps with the sale of the guinea pigs. Washington also grows fodder as food for the guinea pigs. It's an indispensable crop as it means he doesn't have to spend money buying animal food. 

Washington has great hopes for the future as he wishes to become a large producer in the area with a well-known guinea pig business. He also plans to buy another motorcycle taxi to bring in more income. This is his second loan with MFP and he is counting on donors to help him once again. With the money he will buy barley to be used as part of the diet he feeds the guinea pigs.

loans.use: to buy barley to feed to his guinea pigs

loans.name: La Lluvia Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "L. LLUVIA" se encuentra ubicado en el Estado D. Mexico, las clientas decidieron llevar este nombre ya que L. mayor parte del año en esta región llueve. Este grupo esta integrado por 9 clientas en el cual se encuentra L. señora Lorena quien es presidenta del grupo. ElL. se dedica a L. venta D. plantas, es casada, tiene 3 hijos. Desea invertir nuevamente para asi poder ayudar a su esposo con el gasto familiar ya que quiere brindarles a sus hijos un futuro mejor y educación. Con el prestamo que le otorguen va a comprar plantas D. diferentes clases y tamaños que le solicitan sus clientes y pedidos que tiene pendientes D. entregar. L. señora se siente muy contenta con L. oportunidad que le dan para seguir haciendo crecer su negocio. Observaciones: L. señora que no se ve se llama Azucena
texts.en: This group is called "L. LLUVIA". It is located in the State of Mexico. The members decided to adopt this name as for most of the year it rains in this region. This group consists of 9 members with Señora Lorena as the president. She sells plants. She is married and has 3 children. She wants to invest again so that she can help her husband with the household expenses as she wants to proviD. her children with a better future and education. With the loan you willl give her, she is going to buy plants of different types and sizes that her customers are asking for and orders she has pending delivery. She is very happy with the opportunity that she is being given to continue growing her business. Observation: the lady that you can't see in the photo is called Azucena.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of plants of different sizes.

loans.name: Edis Maribel

texts.es:
La señora Edis Maribel se dedica a la elaboración de golosinas como ser Tacos, enchiladas, pollo con tajadas, baleadas, y refrescos naturales, su negocio esta ubicado en una zona estratégica, por ese lugar pasan las personas que van hacia el hospital y muchas compran sus golosinas, sus ventas son de lunes a domingo por las mañanas y la tardes.
Edis utilizara el credito ya que desea ampliar su negocio, necesita comprar una mesa con sillas y hacer una pequeña glorieta para vender todo el día y parte de la noche.
texts.en:
Señora Edis Maribel makes goodies to eat such as tacos, enchiladas, fried chicken with plantains, tortillas filled with refried beans and cheese and soft drinks.
